title: A LA CARTE Publishing Services
description: Choose from our comprehensive suite of professional publishing services to bring your book to life.
company_name: DR Dan Amzallag PhD, CBT, DBT
allParagraphs: Choose from our comprehensive suite of professional publishing services to bring your book to life.
A LA CARTE Hybrid Publishing Services (click here to view the demo site)
Empowering Authors, One Page at a Time
Our Mission

At A LA CARTE Hybrid Publishing Services, we believe every author has a story worth telling—and the right to tell it on their own terms. Our mission is to democratize publishing by giving authors access to professional, high-quality, and customizable publishing solutions—without asking them to give up their rights.
We combine cutting-edge technology with expert industry knowledge to provide a supportive ecosystem where authors can focus on what they do best: writing.
Why We’re Different – Our Author-First Approach
Unlike traditional publishing houses that take control of your manuscript, profits, and creative vision, we believe in a different path.

✅ You keep 100% ownership of your work—both domestic and international rights.
✅ You maintain full control over your creative direction and intellectual property.
✅ You get access to industry-grade publishing services without giving up your voice.
We’re not here to own your story—we’re here to empower it.
The Platform – How It Works
Our intuitive online platform bridges the gap between authors and a curated network of publishing service providers, enabling you to manage your publishing journey on your terms.
For Authors – Your Creative Control Hub
From manuscript to book launch, authors can access everything they need in one place:
Seamless Registration – Quickly create your author profile and get started.
Explore Publishing Services – Browse a comprehensive directory of services, including:
Filter by What Matters Most – Choose providers based on location, customer reviews, and credentials.
Secure Login & Dashboard – View current services, leave feedback, and manage your journey with ease.
Easy Payments – Purchase services safely and securely right through the platform.
Whether you're self-publishing your first book or looking to upgrade your publishing quality, we've got you covered.
For Service Providers – Grow Your Publishing Business
We’re also building a trusted network of certified and experienced service providers who are passionate about supporting authors.
Join the Network – Simple registration to list your services and credentials.
List & Manage Services – Showcase your offerings to a targeted author audience.
Track Engagement – Use your provider dashboard to view bookings, feedback, and author details.
Build Reputation – Earn reviews and ratings that help grow your business.
For Admins – Platform Governance & Oversight
To ensure quality, compliance, and trust across the platform, our admin portal manages:
Why Indiegogo?
We’re launching on Indiegogo to bring A LA CARTE Hybrid Publishing Services to life. Your support will help us:
Who This Helps
Words from the Founders

"We started A LA CARTE Hybrid Publishing Services because we’ve seen too many authors struggle with access, quality, or control. This platform is a new kind of publishing model—one that supports creativity, honors ownership, and offers real choice."
How You Can Help
Back our campaign to help us launch a game-changing platform that puts power back into the hands of creators.
Backer rewards include early access, premium author service bundles, exclusive webinars, and more.
Even if you’re not a writer yourself, you can help change the publishing landscape—one story at a time.
❤️ Join Us in Empowering Authors
By backing A LA CARTE Hybrid Publishing Services, you’re investing in a future where creativity and ownership go hand-in-hand.
Let’s build a world where every author owns their voice—and has the tools to be heard.

title: Hooper Howse
description: Help us provide ALL HOOPERS with THE BEST TRAINERS. Affordable basketball youth mentorship!
allParagraphs: Help us provide ALL HOOPERS with THE BEST TRAINERS. Affordable basketball youth mentorship!

Every former basketball player, from high school/collegiate/professional ranks, has expertise and mentoring capabilities that are being underutilized for lack of a platform for these trainers to offer their services remotely and affordably.
Hooper Howse will connect these youth players and trainers remotely on an mobile app that will uplift two underserved peoples.
Youth players will get outside, use those drive way hoops more often, get consistent exercise, develop basketball skills, build confidence to play with others, create friendships and camaraderie.

Trainers will have the ability to create/scale basketball training businesses and keep themselves connected to the game they love and are passionate about to help young players level up the game of basketball, as well as the game of life.

We are seeking an investment of $25,000 to develop the initial app and get it launched ASAP. Additionally, some funds will be allocated to keep the app live and bug free, for grassroots marketing campaigns and maximizing impact with youth players and trainers right away.

Hooper Howse will make a world of difference for the youth who are looking for encouragement from someone else who has been in their shoes. Research has shown that youth sports helps children gain confidence, foster friendships and build leadership skills among many other benefits.For the trainers, this is the answer for some of them who are trying to figure out how to stay in the game of basketball after spending their whole life building their skill set. For many, basketball is largely their identity and they need to be involved in the game for their well-being.

Building a mobile app is known to be a daunting and difficult journey. However, this is a project that we are so passionate about that we cannot even fathom stepping away from it. We will accomplish our goal no matter what. However, having the help of many kind people who believe in what we are doing will make it so much easier. It's a community and that is exactly what we are building with Hooper Howse!
USE INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOLS. If you can not contribute monetarily, please consider spreading the word and share our campaign on any social media that you are on! The more eyes on the prize, the better!

title: Woof ‘N Meow: The Smart Semi-auto Litter Box
description: Keep the litter bed clean after your cat's use every time! Less time scooping & more time cuddling.
allParagraphs: Keep the litter bed clean after your cat's use every time! Less time scooping & more time cuddling.

Are you still scooping litter and cleaning up after your cat every time? Or are you having trouble keeping up with litter box maintenance? With Woof 'N Meow, you can spend less time scooping and more time cuddling with your best friend.

Meet Woof ‘N Meow, a smart semi-automatic cat litter box that efficiently cleans and scoops after each use. With a large capacity waste drawer, Woof ‘N Meow can hold up to 3x more cat litter and is easy to clean.
Equipped with active oxygen deodorization and an antibacterial system, it keeps the air in your home clean and fresh so you can return to your furry friend in an odorless home.
It's time to replace the unsightly litter box and say goodbye to the dirty paws that leave litter everywhere in the house! The Woof 'N Meow provides your cat with a clean litter bed after every use.

Woof 'N Meow has a spacious, ergonomic chamber that provides maximum comfort for your pets to do their business. It can accommodate cats up to 18 pounds and is a great option for families with multiple cats.
The large capacity waste drawer makes cleaning the litter box as easy as taking out the trash. Also, you can enjoy up to 14 days free of scooping. Meow!

Designed with crystal grid filters, it can effectively remove clumps and particles of different sizes. Moreover, it is suitable for all types of cat litter that can clump. Pick your cat's favorite litter and leave your cat in good hands!

Equipped with a safety security card slot, you never have to worry about the litter box rotating automatically. You can lock the globe manually if your pet uses the smart litter box to ensure more stability. Likewise, you can unlock your card slot if you need to clean the litter box.

As a semi-automatic litter box, you have full control by manually rotating the litter box to clean or empty the litter, which means 100% safety for your pets. With a patented special sifting system, the process begins just minutes after your cat has left the device to ensure the best pet care experience.

Thanks to the motor-free design, you can be sure that your cats do not have to suffer from "flushing noises" or the sudden movement of the litter box. In use, it is quiet so that it would not disturb you or your cats at night to give you peace of mind.
You’ll rarely have to take your Woof ‘N Meow apart. The four-part modular structure of the base, globe, bonnet, and drawer can be individually removed for easy assembly and occasional maintenance.

The fully enclosed door frame is designed to prevent the odor from escaping from the waste drawer into the inner space of the globe. Furthermore, the waste drawer is tightly closed without showing the waste from the outside and simultaneously locking the odor.

Keep your cat's personal space thoroughly sterilized! Woof ‘N Meow has an activated carbon deodorization and antibacterial module that can effectively decompose fecal odor molecules and ensure proper airflow. Thanks to the deodorizing system, you do not have to smell the strong odors when you remove the waste.
Our four-part modular design is constructed with easy upkeep in mind. Whether it’s spot-cleaning or deep-cleaning, the simple modular design allows you to easily clean and maintain your Woof ‘N Meow.

The special sifting system uses a combination of precise time, rotation, and gravity that removes the clumps when you rotate the globe manually. It also removes only the clumps, preserves clean litter, and saves you time.
Carrying cat litter? You don't have to anymore! It's incredibly easy to empty the litter by rotating the device clockwise and lifting the trash bag out of the drawer, which even a child can do!
Created for all breeds, Woof 'N Meow is perfect for a multi-cats family and it's budget-friendly by not using so much litter.
Woof 'N Meow reduces waste by up to 50%, and the door height is moderate to facilitate smaller or older cats with limited mobility.

Woof 'N Meow was founded by a team of animal lovers who are always looking for innovative ways to make pet care easier for everyone. In 2020, the founder of Woof 'N Meow, Wayne, rescued an abandoned cat named Sesame. He was in extremely bad condition and ill at the time.

Immediately, Wayne brought Sesame to the veterinary clinic, where he was diagnosed with panleukopenia and feline infectious peritonitis. After a long 4 months of constant monitoring and care, Sesame was healed and now she is a happy and healthy cat.
But, there was one problem that worried Sesame.

Wayne had a fully automatic cat litter box for Sesame and his two other cats in the house. Despite the convenience, Sesame feared the noise of the automatic cat litter box and refused to use it. However, a traditional cat litter box required too much effort to scoop and clean, which was not suitable for a family with several cats and someone working in the office like Wayne.

After endless days of online research and countless visits to pet stores, Wayne still didn't find the perfect cat litter box he was looking for. Exhausted and concerned, Wayne spoke to one of his friends who had experience in the industrial design industry and connections to the supply chain.

In the modern world, caring for pets should not be so difficult. Wayne and his friend Will decided to work together to create the perfect cat litter box for Sesame and other multi-cat families around the world, hoping to bring them peace of mind.

After 6 months of designing, testing, and preparing, Wayne and Will created the semi-automatic cat litter box as you know it today. Not only has Woof'N Meow solved the potty problems for Sesame, but the team has also made it affordable for other pet parents, and it is perfect for any family with multiple cats.

A message from our founder: Thank you for supporting us on this journey. We hope that the Woof 'N Meow semi-automatic cat litter box will be the solution to your cat's potty problems. We hope that every cat grows up healthy with the company of its beloved owners, who no longer have to clean the litter box every day and can now spend more quality time with them.

title: BROADMIND. Unlock the power of your mind
description: Revolutionary brain-computer interface: Lab-quality EEG Kit that makes advanced neurotech accessible
allParagraphs: Revolutionary brain-computer interface: Lab-quality EEG Kit that makes advanced neurotech accessible
The BROADMIND Research Kit is the world’s first device to combine lab-quality neurotechnology with the accessibility of a consumer product and open-source software ecosystem support.

We’re at the forefront of neurotechnology and AI, and our non-surgical wearable brain-computer interface (BCI) allows users to access State-of-the-Art neuroscience achievements, like cognitive enhancement and controlling devices and applications, with their minds.

Our mission is to bridge the gap between groundbreaking neuroscience and everyday life. We accelerate the transition of advanced neurotech from the lab to the public, empowering individuals with cutting-edge brain-computer interface (BCI) technologies.
By developing an easy-to-use Research Kit, we are democratizing access to these tools, enabling rapid innovation and fast adoption, making the latest neuroscience breakthroughs accessible to all.
Advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technologies are very costly and difficult to use, so they are only available at the world's best research labs.

The path from the lab to consumer adoption often takes multiple years and is very expensive. Ultimately, only a few individuals have access to these groundbreaking technologies. Technologies that enable controlling devices with your mind and other applications.
We're here to change it!
The BROADMIND Research Kit breaks down these barriers, allowing individuals to access state-of-the-art AI models, lab-grade hardware, and immersive BCI applications from home.

Whether you want to play games, explore neurofeedback, or develop your own applications, BROADMIND provides an easy-to-use, ethical, and accessible solution to bring neurotechnology into everyday life.

BROADMIND empowers users to take control of their technological experiences through their thoughts. With high-quality EEG hardware and seamless AI-driven software, this kit offers endless possibilities.

Whether you want to play games, explore neurofeedback, or develop your own applications, BROADMIND provides an easy-to-use, ethical, and accessible solution to bring neurotechnology into everyday life.

We developed a multimodal app that enables anyone to try mind-gaming out of the box. We combine eye-tracking with built-in accelerometer data and mental commands (BCI) for a smooth, precise, and inclusive BCI gaming experience accessible to everyone.
Create your mental commands! Imagine pushing an enemy? to attack, cling a jaw to fire, or modulating your Alpha activity to cast a spell? in the game you love!
By accessing our proprietary AI-SDK, you gain access to our SOTA AI models, which will play an important role in your interaction with the BROADMIND Device.
Our apps will allow you to train your own model, leveraging our State-of-the-Art experimental models, which, for example, predict 3D hand-positioning from neural activity.
Here below is a video of how one of our machine-learning models works while predicting hand movements.
As you can see, we are 70-85% accurate: a new record in BCI performance!

We invited a software developer to test our kit and recorded a live review of his considerations of how easy it is to work with Open-Sourse SDK and how it integrates with the BROADMIND Research Kit. He tested our open-source support and accessed raw data without any restrictions in minutes!
Spoiler: he never tried it before, so this was all first and genuine feedback!

A Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) is a technology that allows direct communication between the brain and external devices. It works by detecting brain signals, either through sensors placed on the head or implanted into the brain, and translating them into commands.
This technology, once science fiction, is becoming real and practical.

Researchers at the University of Texas in Austin, for example, have created a system that allows users to play video games with their minds. The system utilizes electroencephalography (EEG), which captures electrical brain activity and translates it into computer commands, making it possible for users to play games with just their thoughts.

The hardware used in all of those experiments is called EEG (electroencephalography). It allows neural activity to be captured from the surface of the head while employing different Machine Learning techniques allows the decoding of those signals.
We saw how users suffer from existing EEG systems (we were those people). Setting up an EEG device is a two-person job that takes quite some time (up to tens of minutes)
So we decided to change it and create our own device.
After two years of iterations, we developed a unique design and features that enable instant setup and ease of use.
You can’t find a device with this signal quality under $2,000, but we made it!

We also develop and improve BCI decoding algorithms.
Imagining "Left vs Right" and using it as an input is fun, but we wanted to take this to the next level.

We created a multimodal app that combines eye-tracking, a built-in accelerometer, and our proprietary AI algorithms to decode neural commands from the EEG. This unlocks new possibilities in performance, so even gaming with BCI is becoming viable.
Imagine pushing an object, moving your hand/legs, or a specific gesture, or visualize a fireball — Our AI will decode it, and our controller app will execute your desired action.
We also hired leading AI experts to create proprietary models and set new records in accuracy: 95% accuracy for MI & ME!
See the chart below to analyze the specific data of the predicted hand vs. the real hand, shown in the video above.
Discover mental commands that work best for you, or create your own and apply them the way you want them.
BROADMIND solves the critical bottlenecks of existing BCIs and takes them to the next level.
The BROADMIND FULL Research Kit is equipped with state-of-the-art technology to bring lab-grade neurotech into your hands.
See the chart below to analyze our FULL KIT product in detail:

The journey of BROADMIND began in 2019 with the vision of bringing cutting-edge brain-computer interface (BCI) technology out of the lab and into everyday life. After years of research, development, and collaboration with leading neuroscientists from prestigious institutions like EPFL, UCL, Stanford, and UC Davis, we created a device that combines lab-quality hardware with state-of-the-art AI.

Through countless iterations and feedback from experts, we refined the design to be lightweight, easy to use, and highly effective. Our mission has always been to make advanced neurotechnology accessible to everyone, and this autumn marks the launch of our Generation 1 Research Kit on Kickstarter, a significant milestone in democratizing BCI technology for developers, researchers, and tech enthusiasts alike.
Here's Thomas from the BROADMIND team, introducing the Industrial Design process behind the BROADMIND Research Kit.
Here, instead, is Alperen, our Hardware Designer, introducing the custom-designed electronic components that allow the Research Kit to read and amplify the data from our brains.

Founded in 2019 by Ivan Tsy, BROADMIND began with a vision to bring advanced neurotechnology out of the lab and into the hands of everyday users. Through years of research, development, and collaborations with leading neuroscientists from prestigious institutions such as EPFL, UnivercityCollegeLondon, Stanford, and UC Davis, BROADMIND has revolutionized brain-computer interface technology.
Our team of industry veterans and top researchers has pushed the boundaries of what’s possible in neurotech, culminating in the launch of our Generation 1 Research Kit.
Supporting our campaign means a lot to us and to the future of NeuroTech.
Our community will play a key role in turning BROADMIND into a widely adopted device, empowering anyone to create, play, and work in a whole new way.

For this reason, we are releasing the first set of devices at our Super Early Bird Price. This is a gesture of gratitude to all those who have been following us since the beginning, those who joined our huge community on Discord, and those who provided us with feedback and input that is already part of our product.

Our special offers are available for a limited time and in limited quantities. Prices will go up as each tier is sold out. So don’t miss your chance to get the BROADMIND Research Kit at the best price!
Shipping charges will be applied through our Pledge Manager after the campaign ends, in the weeks before delivery.
Below are the estimated shipping costs for each region:

Thank you for joining us on this exciting journey to revolutionize brain-computer interface technology with BROADMIND. Your support is crucial in making this groundbreaking innovation accessible to people worldwide.

Together, we can push the boundaries of what’s possible and shape the future of neurotechnology. Please help us spread the word by sharing BROADMIND with your friends, colleagues, and community. With your help, we can build a global network of innovators and bring the power of the mind to everyday life.
Let’s create the future - one thought at a time!

title: HANDMADE DOG FOOD CANE TERRA
description: Personalized dog meals: new dishes daily, tailored breakfasts and dinners in 4 diet cycles
allParagraphs: Personalized dog meals: new dishes daily, tailored breakfasts and dinners in 4 diet cycles
Hi! We’re Elena and Kirill.

We’re originally from Russia but have been living in the U.S. for the past 6 years.
With over 5 years of business experience in another field, our journey into pet nutrition began a year ago when we lost our beloved Labrador, Sam. The main cause was poor-quality, monotonous food.

We realized that most dog food on the market offers the same meal every day, lacking variety and personalization. Over the past year, we’ve been working with veterinarians and nutritionists to develop a feeding model tailored to each dog’s specific needs. What we discovered is that true quality can only come from hand-prepared meals—not mass production.

That’s why we created CANE TERRA—a concept of local kitchens starting in Palm Springs, California, where expert nutritionists will craft personalized meal plans using fresh, locally sourced ingredients, all made with love.

Here’s something most people don’t realize: for the average cost of $600/month, your dog can receive nothing but real, fresh food—varied meals, individually tailored, prepared with exceptional quality.
Compare that to spending just a bit less on mass-produced dry kibble or the same canned pâté every single day.
Is your dog’s long-term health worth the $100 difference?
For us, this isn’t just a business. It’s a mission to help people truly care for their pets in the best way possible.
What We Need & What You Get

We’ve already launched a small advertising campaign and received an enthusiastic response from our local community—many of our neighbors have shown strong interest in our product, and we’ve even started a waitlist. However, launching a high-quality food production operation requires more than just passion.
To do things the right way—meeting all health, safety, and quality standards—we need funding for:
Renting a professional kitchen space
Purchasing specialized equipment for proper ingredient processing, packaging, and freezing
Hiring a team of cooks starting September 1st to help prepare the first custom meals

Importantly, our nutritionists, veterinarians, and core team will not receive salaries from this funding. We are fully committed to this mission and do not intend to use any part of the funds for personal income. Our goal is to create a product that can save dogs’ lives, not profit from it.

If we don’t reach our full funding goal, we’ll have to seek bank loans. But we would much rather grow with the support of a like-minded community—and redirect any savings from loan interest to support dog shelters in the U.S. and in underprivileged countries where help is urgently needed.
By supporting CANE TERRA, you're not just helping us launch a new product—you’re becoming part of a movement that puts dogs’ health and happiness first.

The CANE TERRA project was born out of a pain that thousands of families around the world have experienced—the heartbreak of losing a beloved pet. We lost our dog, Sam, because he didn’t receive something that should have been so simple: real, high-quality food. It was preventable. We can’t change the past—but we’ve committed ourselves to changing the future for other dogs.

Our mission is not just to cook tasty meals. We want to give every dog a chance at a long, healthy, and happy life. We believe that nutrition is the foundation of health—and if we care for our dogs' diets with the same seriousness we apply to feeding our children, we can save countless lives.

Every bowl prepared in our kitchen will carry more than just fresh ingredients—it will carry love, care, and responsibility. It will be food made with soul. Food made the way you’d cook for your own dog.
Your contribution will help us:
Launch our first kitchen, where meals are hand-prepared according to personalized recipes
Build a new culture of canine nutrition based on science, variety, and freshness
Give a voice to those who can’t speak—our loyal companions
We’re not just asking for money. We’re inviting you to join a movement that can change lives. Together, we can create a world where every dog receives what they truly deserve—health, love, and care.

Launching a fresh food production business—especially in the pet industry—comes with real challenges. From meeting strict health and safety regulations to managing logistics and ingredient sourcing, we know the road ahead won't be simple.
Here are some of the main risks we may face:
Delays in equipment delivery or supply chain disruptions
Hiring and training team members who share our commitment to quality and care
Scaling operations smoothly as demand grows
But we’re not stepping into this blindly.

With over 5 years of business experience, we know how to build efficient systems, lead teams, and manage financial and operational risks. We've spent the past year consulting with veterinarians, nutritionists, and food technology experts to design a scalable model—from kitchen workflows to packaging and delivery logistics.
Here’s how we’re prepared to overcome these challenges:
We’ve partnered with reliable suppliers who offer warranties and support.
We've built in buffer time for testing and fine-tuning our process before launch.
We’re taking on key roles ourselves in the early stages to ensure everything meets our standards.
And most importantly—we’re fully committed to stepping in and doing whatever it takes, from cooking to delivery, to make this work.
At the heart of it all is our purpose: helping dogs live longer, healthier lives. That’s what drives us, and that’s what keeps us ready to face any challenge that comes our way.
We understand that not everyone can contribute financially—and that’s completely okay. But you can still make a huge impact by helping us spread the word!
Here’s how you can help:
Share our campaign with your friends, family, and fellow dog lovers
Post the link on your social media, in group chats, or in online pet communities
Use Indiegogo’s share tools to help amplify our message
Sometimes, one share can lead to the right person finding and supporting the project.
Thank you for any and all forms of support—we truly appreciate it! ❤️

title: Leashes With Heart ,Support Dogs & Their People
description: Help us launch, Leashes and collars that are built to last, priced for real dog owners,
allParagraphs: Help us launch, Leashes and collars that are built to last, priced for real dog owners,

Great! Here's a complete draft of your Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign content, based on your idea for LucDog – stylish, affordable, and durable dog gear, written in clear, engaging English, and ready to be published. You can adjust personal details or add a photo/video later.
? Short Summary
Hi! I'm [Your Name], the founder of LucDog — a project built from my love for dogs and a desire to make dog ownership more accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

LucDog offers affordable, sustainable, and stylish dog leashes and collars — designed to be both functional and fashionable. This campaign helps me take the first big step: launching our first collection and getting it into the hands (and paws!) of dog owners who need it most.
By supporting LucDog, you're helping us make high-quality dog gear available to all — including those who face mobility or transportation challenges. Every contribution counts!
? What We Need & What You Get
We’re aiming to raise 200,000 SEK (~$18,000 USD) to cover:
Ethical and sustainable material sourcing
Manufacturing and packaging of our first leash & collar collection
Setting up an online store
Local delivery services for customers with mobility issues
Marketing and outreach
? Perks
To say thank you, we’ve created unique perks for our backers:
200 SEK – A thank you and social media shoutout
350 SEK – One LucDog leash or collar in your choice of color
600 SEK – Matching leash + collar set
1000 SEK – VIP pack: full set + personalized thank you video + name on our website as an early supporter
If we don’t reach our full goal, funds will go toward producing a smaller batch of products and setting up local delivery to test our concept and build from there.
? The Impact

LucDog is more than just dog gear — it's about accessibility, inclusion, and community. Many dog owners, especially seniors, people with disabilities, or those without cars, find it difficult to access quality dog products or services.
LucDog aims to fix that. With doorstep delivery and well-designed, budget-friendly gear, we’re making life with a dog a little easier and a lot more joyful.
Your contribution helps bring this vision to life — and gives back to real people and real dogs in your community.
⚠️ Risks & Challenges
Starting a new brand has its challenges — especially around production, logistics, and delivery.
However, I’ve spent months researching manufacturers, testing materials, and designing prototypes to make sure we’re ready to launch smoothly.
If production delays or cost increases occur, I’ll keep you updated transparently. We’ll start small and scale responsibly, prioritizing quality and customer trust above all.
? Other Ways You Can Help
Can’t contribute right now? No problem!
You can still support LucDog by:
Sharing this campaign with dog lovers you know
Following us on social media and spreading the word
Using Indiegogo’s share tools to help us reach more people
Every post, share, and message helps us get closer to our goal. Thank you for being part of the LucDog journey!

description: Zeus Smart Ring – blood pressure&ECG tracking for balance. No cuff. No calibration. Just your rhythm
allParagraphs: Zeus Smart Ring – blood pressure&ECG tracking for balance. No cuff. No calibration. Just your rhythm

This question sparked our journey. It inspired us to explore, develop, and ultimately create something truly unique:

How it works:
Wear the ring on one hand — its internal sensors pick up on your body’s natural signals throughout the day.

The built-in PPG sensor observes patterns such as pulse rhythm, movement, and daily flow — passively and without any input.
For real-time signal snapshots, lightly touch the ring's outer surface with your other hand to activate the ECG-based sensing feature.

While the PPG runs in the background, the ECG component offers on-demand signal feedback — giving you a moment of personal insight whenever you choose.

The ring is placed on the finger, and by touching it with the other hand, the sensors are activated.

All data is stored in your encrypted archive, allowing you to review your trends and history whenever you like.
We use end-to-end encryption and industry-grade security protocols to keep your information private — always.

title: Leather Webcam Covers
description:
Made from Micro-Suction tape and high-quality leather offcuts.
Keep your privacy private in style.
allParagraphs: Made from Micro-Suction tape and high-quality leather offcuts. Keep your privacy private in style.
web //// instagram //// facebook
Colorful Leather Webcam Covers
We all need our privacy from time to time and covering the webcam is the easiest and safest way to do so.
I am a fashion designer and have a lot of leather leftovers.
Colorful Leather webcam covers, made from Micro-Suction tape and high-quality leather offcuts. Keep your privacy private in style.
They leave no trace and are reusable
Keep your privacy private.
The perfect size: 9mm (0.35 inch) diameter. Extremely thin: less than 1mm. One side is colorful 100% goat leather. One side is Micro-Suction tape
Mug shot of the Leather Webcam Cover: one side is colorful 100% goat leather, the other is 0.5mm Micro-suction tape
Choose your color!
8 random colors (including 1 black), or all black
Shipped in packs of 8 webcam covers
Micro-suction tape is a closed cell foam with microscopic craters in its surface.
When the tape is pushed against a sealed surface the craters function like micro suction cups allowing the tape to stick without the use of adhesives.
It sticks without glue to smooth surfaces such as glass, plastic, etc…
If you want to learn more about Micro-suction tape you can check out the Wikipedia page or watch this fun video
No glue, no tape, reusable and no sticky traces!
Thousands of micro suction cups
And extremely strong
It's like an eye lens, but will blind your webcam
If your cover loses some of its bonding power, simply wipe it with a damp cloth to remove the dust.

Working with leather (or any other material) means having offcuts during the production process. Some people throw them away, some keep them.
At Striiiipes, I keep most leftovers (at least what can be used on other projects). The smaller the offcuts are, the smaller the products can be.
Zero-waste fashion refers to items of clothing that generate little or no textile waste in their production. It can be considered to be a part of the broader Sustainable fashion movement.

Standard garment production generates an average of 15% textile waste due to the stratification or hierarchy of the garment production process. it’s even higher in the leather industry, due to leather's natural shapes
As you can see with this picture, the middle parts have the highest quality, and the rest are leftovers.
The best parts are in the middle, the rest are leftovers
Because of the small size of the Leather Webcam Covers (0.9mm), I can reduce waste to the maximum, even when using very small scraps.
Using the most out of offcuts

I already have a lot of leather offcuts, of many different colors. I bought a lot of very high quality leather at the "Réserve des Arts" here in Paris. They collect wastes from French fashion brands, select and sort out what can be used again. Upcycling at its best!
If needed, I can always go back for more !
So much offcuts in stock
Compatible with all types of devices
Desktops and laptops
Tablets
Smartphones (However, covering your iPhone X will disable the Animojis)
It works on all types of devices and material (plastic, glass, steel...).
It's so thin, it's invisible.
Pledge 9€ - A pack of 8 Leather Webcam Covers. 1 black and 7 random colors
Pledge 9€ - A pack of 8 Leather Webcam Covers. 8 black
Pledge 17€ - 2 packs of 8 Leather Webcam Covers. 8 random colors (including 1 black) and 8 black
Pledge 17€ - 2 packs of 8 Leather Webcam Covers. 2 black and 14 random colors
Pledge 17€ - 2 packs of 8 Leather Webcam Covers. 16 black
Pledge 25€ - 3 packs of 8 Leather Webcam Covers. 16 random colors (including 2 black) and 8 black
I first tried a lot of sizes, shapes, etc... And finally decided on a 9mm round shape.
Here I tried a lot of shapes and sizes
I went to the best - and one of the last - punch hole maker in Paris. His workshop is just great! You can make whatever you want.
Working on the punch holes prototypes
Super cool workshop!
I then had 2 perfect punch holes
Finally the 2 custom made punch holes

The Micro-Suction tape is quite expensive, so I decided to have a square of 9 holes at a time. I would then cut small square sheets of tape and leather, stick them together, and punch! ending up with 9 covers in one punch, and avoiding waste as much as possible. Actually, I updated the punch hole to 15 holes. Cutting 66% faster!
The "webcam covers" punch holes: 9 covers at a time
This special punch hole is used to make a beautiful packaging, a single sheet of colorful leather that will hold 8 webcam covers.
The "Packaging" punch hole: To hold the 8 webcam covers
My next step is another workshop in Paris where Dominique makes sure that all my leather scraps are of the same thickness. His huge leather splitter gets the work done in seconds!
I have leftovers of various thickness
This huge leather splitter is so cool, it's called a "refendeuse" in French
And voila ! They are now all 0.3mm thin
BOOM ! 0.3mm!! Super thin leather sheets!
And then the fun part - Hydraulic press!
At Striiiipes, we think the product packaging is very important. The Leather Webcam Cover packaging is simple yet functional: A sheet of colorful leather holds the 8 covers.
As well as for the leather webcam covers, the packaging is made out of leather offcuts, randomly picked, the color will be a surprise!
White cardboard, colorful leather offcuts.
Easy to take, easy to store
I am Arthur Lhermitte, fashion designer based in Paris. I created the Striiiipes brand in 2012: Lifestyle accessories and leather goods.

After graduating from the Studio Berçot in Paris, Arthur Lhermitte, Striiiipes’ artistic director, designs exquisite yet audacious fashion products to fit modern lifestyles. Using the stripes as a visual manifesto, the products range from small fashion accessories for your everyday life to delicately crafted limited editions.
We like stripes, craftsmanship combined with technology, attention to details, lobsters… We make most of our products in our Parisian workshop.

title: CaddieVision - Your Augmented Reality AI Caddie
description: CaddieVision™ AR glasses give you real-time feedback while you play. Made by golfers, for golfers.
allParagraphs: CaddieVision™ AR glasses give you real-time feedback while you play. Made by golfers, for golfers.

The app and wearable solve the problems of uncertainty and decision fatigue that plague golfers on the course. CaddieVision™ gives you real-time visual and audio feedback to help you make data-informed decisions quickly, reducing anxiety and indecision during play, and improving your handicap in record time.
To those who love to play, golf is much more than a sport.

It's a quest to beat the odds and to conquer the course that often seems just beyond reach. With the club in your hand and the crisp grass underneath your feet, golf ignites a constant yearning to be better and to push yourself further. It teaches the relentless pursuit of improvement which makes every step forward feel like a triumph.
Golf is also an investment.
While every golfer wants that perfect shot, not everyone has the time or budget to pay for a golf instructor, rangefinders, swing analyzers, and putting aids to help you lower your handicap.
This is especially true if you're a beginner and fall within the handicap range of most golfers in the US. 68.18% of male golfers and 69.12% of female golfers are in the handicap range of 10-34.

CaddieVision™ makes golf accessible for players of all skill levels and makes improving your handicap easier than ever before. Get real-time visual and audio feedback to line you up for the perfect shot.
From suggesting which club to use to how to line you up for your shot, CaddieVision™ gives you everything you need to lower your handicap with ease and speed.

CaddieVision™ makes golf accessible for players of all skill levels. The app and wearable use AI and data analytics to give you real-time insights while on the course. The interactive features and personalized insights improve your game with every swing.

Get real-time visual and audio feedback to keep your head down and focus on your swing mechanics, ensuring better contact and improved consistency in all your shots—clearing the path for a flawless round.

With CaddieVision™, you’re not confined to the course. You can improve your swing and analyze your performance in an indoor golf simulator. Reduce your guesswork and make your shots more accurate outdoors at a course, practice range, or indoor golf simulator.

All CaddieVision™ modes are designed to help you take your game to the next level. From which club to use, how to swing, and how to line you up for your shot, every mode gives you the analysis, tips, and tricks you need to lower your handicap.

The Shot Mode provides precise distance to the center of the green and recommends the appropriate club based on your pre-programmed stock yardages. After selecting a club, it guides you on optimal ball position and stance for that specific club.

The precision of Rangefinder Mode reduces your guesswork and makes your shots more accurate. This mode shows you the distances to the hole you are on to help you select the best club and shot strategy.

Tournament Mode enhances your golfing experience during competitive play. When activated, this mode focuses solely on displaying GPS data and Rangefinder Mode while deactivating features like shot assistance to ensure fair play. It gives you crucial distance measurements to the hole without distractions from other features.

Range Mode enables you to practice with every club in your bag while ensuring proper ball positioning for each one. This feature encourages steady head positioning, promoting consistent swing mechanics. Over time, this repetition builds muscle memory, allowing you to execute each shot with precision and accuracy.

Shot Tracking delivers precise distance measurements for every club you use. Over multiple rounds, you’ll gain a clear understanding of your average distances for each club. Additionally, it tracks shot accuracy, providing valuable insights to help you fine-tune your performance.

Technology improves rapidly! So, we’ll be launching a hardware upgrade program (free for customers who support our preorder launch campaign). Return your current or old hardware, and we’ll send you upgraded hardware at no extra cost. We will be donating the outdated glasses to charity.

With cutting-edge technology and innovative features, CaddieVision™ is more than just a golf accessory—it’s your personal AI-powered caddie, ready to guide you every step of the way.  Whether you're a beginner trying to lower your handicap or an experienced golfer seeking precision, CaddieVision™ provides the tools you need to take your game to the next level.
Make your golf journey easier, faster, and more enjoyable with CaddieVision™—the future of golf caddies is here.
CaddieVision™ is designed to enhance your golfing experience no matter where you are:
It was March of 2023 when Jason Schneider, the golfer behind CaddieVision™, was on the course standing in the rough, under a tree, with 148 yards to the hole.
It was the most challenging hole on the course, and as he looked at the ball sitting down in the thick grass, something told him to grab his 8-iron instead of his usual 9-iron for this distance.

He set up with the ball a little further back in his stance to compensate for the rough, and when he struck it, the ball flew perfectly. It never left the stick, landing just a foot short of the hole and rolling in for an eagle.
As he sat in the cart, still riding the high of that shot, he started reflecting on the round: what was different today? It was the setup!
There is nothing like CaddieVision™ in the golfing industry—there are rangefinders and apps, but nothing that does the same thing.
The entire CaddieVision™ team is passionate about golf, so we’re committed to giving golfers the tools they need to lock in their setup and maintain that critical focus.

title: Hum - Open-Source AI Data Sorting & Private NAS
description: One app to rule your documents, emails, tasks, and more—free forever, with an optional NAS !
allParagraphs: One app to rule your documents, emails, tasks, and more—free forever, with an optional NAS !
Short Summary

Hi, I’m Liam, a tech enthusiast and maker with a passion for simplifying digital lives. For years, I’ve been frustrated by the chaos of scattered documents, overflowing inboxes, and Big Tech clouds that don’t respect privacy. That’s why I created Hum—an open-source mobile app that’s your digital home, sorting your life in a tenth of the time with AI. It organizes documents, emails, tasks, and finances, connects to local storage or our custom NAS, and even hosts community-built apps. With your support, we’ll launch Hum and build a private, high-capacity NAS (up to 16+ drive bays!) for total data control. Back us to join a movement that empowers you—and a global community—to own your digital future.
What We Need & What You Get
We’re aiming to raise $250,000 to bring Hum to life. Here’s the breakdown:
60% ($150,000): App development—building Hum’s AI for document sorting, mini-apps (calendar, to-do, email), and the third-party app store.
25% ($62,500): Hardware production—prototyping and manufacturing the Hum NAS, with 3D-printed cases, dual power supplies, and 10–16+ drive bays.
10% ($25,000): Community outreach—seeding the open-source ecosystem on GitHub, X, and maker forums.
5% ($12,500): IndieGoGo fees and reward fulfillment.
Perks to Get You Excited:
$10: Join the Hum Hype Squad with a shoutout on GitHub and early roadmap voting.
$35: Be a Beta Dreamer—test Hum’s AI and stunning UI before launch.
$75: Become a Premium Pioneer with a 1-year premium subscription (unlimited AI, third-party apps).
$250: Get the Small NAS (10–12 bays) to sync Hum privately.
$600: Grab the Large NAS (12–16+ bays, dual PSUs) with a custom case engraving.
$2,000: Be an Open-Source Legend—suggest a feature and get 2 Large NAS units!
If we don’t hit the full goal, funds will still go toward app development first, ensuring Hum launches as a free, open-source app. Any extra will accelerate NAS production.
The Impact

Hum isn’t just an app—it’s a revolution. For you, it’s a game-changer: imagine scanning a receipt, and AI files it, tags it, and adds it to your budget—all in seconds. Imagine swiping to archive emails, linking tasks to a calendar, and building custom apps with a global community. For the world, Hum is a step toward digital freedom—an open-source ecosystem where you control your data, not Big Tech. Pair it with our NAS, and you’ve got a private cloud with up to 288TB of storage, secure and offline-first. As a maker, I’ve built prototypes before, and our stunning UI mockups are ready to wow you. Back us to make digital organization effortless and empower creators worldwide.
Risks & Challenges

Building Hum is ambitious, and we want to be upfront. Developing AI for document sorting and email management is complex—training models to handle diverse documents (receipts, contracts, IDs) takes time and testing. We might face delays in perfecting the AI’s accuracy, especially with user side notes (e.g., “Tag as #Travel”). On the hardware side, manufacturing the NAS with 3D-printed cases and dual PSUs could hit supply chain snags, like sourcing reliable PSUs or scaling production for 16+ drive bays.

But I’m ready for this. I’ve coded apps and built hardware prototypes for years, and I’m assembling a team of open-source devs and makers to tackle these hurdles. Our plan: rigorous beta testing with backers to refine the AI, and partnerships with 3D-printing communities to streamline NAS production. We’ll keep you updated every step of the way—transparency is our promise.
Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute right now? You can still make a huge difference! Spread the word about Hum—share our campaign on X, Reddit, or your favorite maker forums. Tell your friends, coworkers, or anyone who’d love a smarter way to manage their digital life. Use IndieGoGo’s share tools to amplify our reach. Together, we can build a community that redefines digital organization—for everyone, by everyone.

title: soilkind: From kitchen waste to compost in 48h
description: soilkind is a fully automatic kitchen composter which unites natural composting & unique technology
allParagraphs: soilkind is a fully automatic kitchen composter which unites natural composting & unique technology

Important information: When we started our crowdfunding campaign here, our kitchen composter was called KALEA. A lot has happened since then, we've perfected our prototype and entered into a fantastic production partnership with a great company.
We've grown. And so our name has continued to evolve. Since December 2022, KALEA is called soilkind.
soilkind turns your organic waste into nutrient-rich compost. In only 48 hours.

Technology has made its way into every aspect of our daily life, but nobody really pays attention to the way we treat food scraps at home. Many households have no solution to dispose of food scraps in a convenient, clean, and sustainable way. This is also a global problem since organic waste accounts for up to 50% of the overall waste volume. Nature gave us the inspiration we needed to solve this problem. soilkind unites the natural composting process with smart technology to transform organic waste into nutrition-rich compost. We say: Don’t waste your waste!
If you experience any of these situations, you definitely need to upgrade your kitchen routine:
What’s on your chopping boards and plates? Share the leftovers with soilkind. It can handle any kind of organic waste.

We knew there had to be a better solution. We wanted to create a smart device that was just as good as a compost pile, but faster, more comfortable to use, hygienic, and without any unpleasant odors. More than two years of research and testing led us to the perfect solution with our unique and patent-pending technology.

We are the only ones who offer a complete solution. Other products promise to create “fertilizer” - but they really only just dry and grind up waste with no biological decomposition. This output can grow mold, is not nutritious to plants, and can actually be harmful. That’s why only soilkind compost is king!

There is no compost fairy. soilkind impresses with its own magic: an innovative, fully automatic technology with lots of sensors inside. Three simple steps and 48 hours is all it takes for your organic waste to turn into real nourishing compost.

Step 1: Fill soilkind with your food scraps. Are you a real foodie? No worries, soilkind is designed to handle the weekly organic waste volume of a typical four-person family (appx. 2 cycles of 10 liters). Our robust shredding system processes and dries almost everything, even nutshells, and small bones!

As a nice side effect, this leads to a volume reduction of 85%. When enough material accumulates, soilkind automatically processes it to the composting chamber. No odors or fruit flies — just your excitement for fresh compost.

Step 2: The composting chamber of soilkind is full of sensors and has an intelligent control system. A perfect combination of temperature, humidity, and aeration wakes up the natural microorganisms inside the organic material and turns it into a land of milk and honey that accelerates the microorganisms’ metabolism. soilkind substantially reduces composting time from several months to just 48 hours.

Step 3: The result? Ready-to-use compost for all your plants and flowers — indoor and outdoor. Your plants will love it since only compost contains such a full spectrum of essential plant nutrients. And if you don’t need all your compost at once, no worries, your soilkind compost can be stored for up to two years.

Plants are living beings, and like us, they need nutrients to grow and stay healthy. So treating them with compost should be on your regular plant routine list. But be careful. In some cases, using dried organic waste (often referred to as "fertilizer") can also cause mold and inhibit plant growth. And no plant parent wants this. Right? soilkind compost is so rich in nutrients that it can be mixed in a 1:10 ratio. This means 1 part of soilkind compost with 10 parts of soil.

Garden compost is the most natural way to dispose of organic waste. If managed carefully, it leads to already matured compost. However, this takes a whole lot of time and especially cooked food shouldn't be treated this way since it attracts vermin.

soilkind transforms the majority of compounds in your food scraps like sugar, starch, and proteins. These are broken down within 48h to fresh compost. If mixed with earth, fresh compost gives an immediate boost to your plants and realizes its nutritional potential.
Food waste dryers do only one thing: shredding and drying food. There is no biological decomposition process involved. The organic compounds in this waste are thus inaccessible to plants.
STEP 1: REMINERALIZATION
Your organic waste is a bit like a fresh and full shopping bag. In order for your plants to use the nutrients, the "bag" must first be unpacked. This unpacking is called remineralization.

During the remineralization process, organic molecules are converted into inorganic minerals. This conversion is done by omnipresent microorganisms such as bacteria and fungi, which are a natural part of our food.
STEP 2: COMPOSTING
During composting, the main components of organic waste (sugars, starch, proteins, fats, and at a later stage, cellulose) are broken down.

The compost quality and the conversion time can be influenced by providing optimal metabolic conditions for the microorganisms over a certain period of time. These conditions include temperature, pH value, moisture, amount of oxygen, and surface area. The better the conditions are met, the faster high-quality compost is achieved.
Combining the latest technology with the superpowers of natural microorganisms - that’s the essence of soilkind. All of this happens inside our fully automatic kitchen composter in only 48 hours.
Did you know that incorrectly disposed organic waste is not only a wasted resource but is also more dangerous for the climate than CO2?

When organic waste is dumped in a landfill, it undergoes anaerobic decomposition (because of the lack of oxygen) and generates methane gas. Methane gas is a potent greenhouse gas — about 28 times more harmful than carbon dioxide at warming the earth, on a 100-year timescale, and more than 80 times more powerful over 20 years.
Due to a lack of convenient and clean waste disposal techniques, a significant amount of organic waste is sent to landfills - even in the most developed countries.
This is one of the main reasons why we want to revolutionize your daily organic waste routine.

Bogs represent an important “carbon sink” – a place where CO2 is stored below ground and can't escape into the atmosphere and increase global warming. They only cover 3 % of the earth's surface but store about 30% of global CO2. One hectare of the bog with a 15-centimeter thick peat layer contains about as much carbon as a hundred-year-old forest in the same area. That’s amazing! But bogs are in danger. In many places, they are extracted to produce peat, which is then used to enrich potting soil. The protection of bogs is an incredibly important part of climate protection, that is very close to our hearts at soilkind. Therefore we chose to support an NGO which is committed to the protection of bogs. Also, your homemade compost leads to bog protection. With soilkind you can always use peat-free soil because our compost airs the soil and provides it with enough nutrients. The mixing ratio is 1 to 10. 1 part soilkind compost and 10 parts peat-free potting soil.
Give your indoor plants a green booster or nourish your veggies outside. There are so many ways to spread some compost love.

soilkind was founded in 2017. Since day one, our mission has been to create a long-lasting product that combines our digital lifestyle with design and sustainability. Many steps have been mastered during this time including several prototypes, endless compost testing, and cooperation with leading research institutes.
After many tests and trials, the 4th generation prototype was created. Here is an unedited glimpse of the magic behind the machine:

A smart home that feels completely natural – that’s the challenge of digital devices today. We have created soilkind's design to integrate our kitchen composter stylishly and organically into everyday kitchen routines. Puristic, beautiful, practical, and easy to use.
soilkind is as unique as your food scraps. Keep everything in focus and learn more:

We have been working towards this day for more than two years. Now that we have a fully functional prototype that completely meets our requirements, we are on our way to start serial production. With your help, we can save the world from incorrectly disposed organic waste by giving every household the power to create its own compost.
BY NOW WE HAVE:
WITH YOUR HELP WE WILL:

We are a passionate team of material scientists, engineers, and hobby gardeners located in Stuttgart, Germany. Our mission is to develop innovative solutions that increase the convenience of handling food waste at home while improving sustainability.

title: ART: Extended 3D Viewer For Multi-Tasking
description: Ultra-Wide Open View Design|Sharp Edge,No Glare|Streaming|Gaming|Smartphone|FPV|Photography|Tablet
allParagraphs: Ultra-Wide Open View Design|Sharp Edge,No Glare|Streaming|Gaming|Smartphone|FPV|Photography|Tablet
Based on previous generations of products and market competitors, we came up with a new idea to create a "lightweight" head-mounted display that enables multi-dimensional collaboration.

Introducing Goovis Art. This revolutionary head-mounted display features a "hanging design ", unlike previous models. It includes an arm-like mechanism allowing you to enjoy your private cinema anytime, anywhere. It integrates seamlessly into your fragmented time, unrestricted by location or posture, and even enables multitasking.
Equipped with micro OLED screens and 1920*1080 pixels per eye, it offers a lightweight build without compromising on picture quality.

With previous products, you likely encountered some of the following issues: full coverage outdoors made movement inconvenient and unsafe due to limited awareness of your surroundings; the product was too large to fold and took up too much storage space; and you had to remove your glasses to wear it.
Goovis Art solves these problems. Now, dive into the revolutionary "Hanging Design" to truly understand its benefits.

People might wonder, what is a "Hanging Design"? Simply put, this unique design features an arm-like mechanism that allows you to easily flip down the Goovis Art in front of your eyes, transforming your view into a "private cinema." Additionally, Goovis Art offers a highly adjustable viewing angle, catering to various viewing preferences.

Compared to traditional AR glasses, Goovis Art offers a wider peripheral vision. It is not affected by ambient light intensity, allowing you to keep an eye on your surroundings effortlessly. Stay aware of everything happening around you.

Within your field of vision, you can see both internal and external spaces. GOOVIS Art is a private screen placed in front of your eyes, displaying any content you want to watch. Its extremely compact design minimally obstructs your view, allowing you to see a broader real-world perspective. Interaction with the outside world is almost seamless, making it perfect for entertainment, gaming, and work.

Most head-mounted displays or AR glasses on the market either require you to remove your prescription glasses to wear them or offer diopter adjustments only up to 800 degrees, which may not meet everyone's needs. Goovis Art is suitable for two different wearing methods.

Firstly, if you have moderate to high myopia, you can wear Goovis Art directly without removing your glasses. Secondly, if you have mild myopia, Goovis Art supports 0-350° diopter adjustment. It can be used by everyone in the family, including the elderly, children, and adults.

When getting glasses, you need to measure your interpupillary distance (IPD). If the IPD is not matched, you may experience blurred vision, double vision, headaches, and eye discomfort. The same applies to wearing a head-mounted display—IPD must be matched!

GOOVIS Art is likely one of the only open-type head-mounted displays on the market that supports IPD adjustment. With a wide adjustable range of 56~76mm, it ensures that the majority of users can achieve a matched IPD, providing the best possible visual experience.
We recommend three viewing angles tailored for different scenarios. Integrate your fragmented time and enjoy the convenience of multitasking.
Goovis Art's main body weighs only 110g, adding no extra burden to your head. This significantly enhances overall comfort.

Goovis Art is not only exceptionally lightweight but also foldable for easy storage. We provide a travel pouch so you can conveniently place Goovis Art in your pocket, backpack, or handbag without taking up your travel storage space. Enjoy a truly portable private cinema experience anytime, anywhere.

Goovis Art is more than just a tech gadget; it promotes a healthier entertainment experience. By using Goovis Art, you can avoid neck and back pain often caused by prolonged screen time in a single position. No more straining to look down at your device. Enjoy your favorite content in any comfortable posture—whether you’re sitting, lying down, leaning back, standing, or even upside down. With Goovis Art, the screen is always perfectly positioned in front of your eyes.

Any device that supports the DP Alt Mode transmission protocol can stream content directly to the GOOVIS ART head-mounted display. It is compatible with multiple devices, making it perfect for gamers, movie enthusiasts, workaholics, and live stream or short video fans alike.

Visual clarity goes beyond just panel resolution. Multiple factors contribute to seeing details clearly and comfortably. GOOVIS Art features dual OLED displays with a resolution of 1920*1080 (4496 PPI), providing an ultra-clear, immersive, and lifelike HMD experience.

Adhering to GOOVIS's commitment to superior pixel quality, we bring DSLR-level image quality to the open head-mounted display market! Our ultra-precise optical system preserves pixel details without any loss, providing an exceptional visual experience.
Compared to mobile devices and TVs, the screen size of Goovis Art is a whopping 110 inches. Enjoy a vast visual experience with GOOVIS Art! Its large screen delivers a true cinema experience.

Dive into a world of vivid experiences with GOOVIS Art! This groundbreaking device features an impressive 110% sRGB, enhancing every color with richness and depth. Whether you're watching movies, gaming, or browsing documents, you'll be treated to an immersive visual feast. Enjoy vibrant colors and crystal-clear details that make every moment spectacular.

Just like our previous exceptional products, Goovis Art not only plays 2D movies but also offers a one-click switch to 3D mode. This allows you to enjoy a vast collection of high-quality 3D movies anytime, anywhere. Unlike traditional cinema where you need 3D glasses, Goovis Art delivers perfect 3D visuals without any additional eyewear, provided the source is 3D.
Pair it with the D4 handheld 4K media player, equipped with an 8000mAh battery for extended use. Seamlessly connect via HDMI and enjoy worry-free viewing.

The D4 Dongle Media Player is an all-in-one wireless device preloaded with all your favorite streaming apps, such as YouTube, Netflix, and Amazon Prime. It features an 8000mAh battery that supports up to 6 hours of use and can be used with SD cards, all TVs, headphones, and home theater systems.

Goovis Art's headphones come with built-in speakers, eliminating the need for additional audio devices. Equipped with advanced built-in speakers, Goovis Art delivers precise and dynamic stereo sound for a truly captivating experience. Additionally, the device features a 3.5mm headphone jack, allowing you to enjoy your content with or without headphones.

Like its predecessors, GOOVIS Art is also compatible with GE10 wireless headphones. If you prefer wireless headphones, there are two ways to connect: 1. Take out the G310 receiver and insert it into the Type-C port on the G3X. 2. Connect via Bluetooth (Bluetooth 5.3). This convenient pairing method allows you to enjoy a comprehensive and private audio experience.

GOOVIS has also designed a hard travel case specifically for the Art. The sturdy exterior provides enhanced protection, while the custom-designed interior ensures a perfect fit, keeping the device securely in place. The top cover includes a mesh pocket for additional storage of accessories such as data cables. This makes it convenient for you to carry Goovis Art on long trips and enjoy your private cinema anytime, anywhere.
Goovis Art requires only a USB-C cable connection, or you can use an adapter with an HDMI port. One screen can replace all your devices.

To ensure a comfortable wearing experience, Goovis Art is equipped with a zero-pressure headband. It feels as if your mom's hand gently supports the back of your head, allowing for long-term wear without discomfort. Enjoy an immersive experience during extended entertainment and gaming sessions without fatigue.
We want to share an ingenious DIY accessory created by one of our loyal fans. To avoid disturbing his wife’s sleep at night, he made a blackout cover. This is a fantastic idea!
We encourage everyone to think creatively and help make Goovis a versatile, innovative product that suits everyone's needs.

Yes, we will cover the shipping fee for the GOOVIS Art and the forwarder will be DHL, FedEx, and UPS, so please don't worry about the shipping time and the safety. For the taxes, we will lower the value of the goods when shipping in order to avoid the taxes. But it may vary according to your country and location. If the taxes are generated, please deal with it, as a sender, we can't cover the taxes for occurrent cases. Thanks

As a technical leading company in the AR/VR Head-Mounted Displays (HMD) field, GOOVIS (which means ‘Good Vision) is committed to the design and manufacture of various near-eye displays (NED) core optical engines and the development and application of HMDs. NED Optics independently owns the core technologies of near-eye displays. So far the company has submitted over 160 patent applications and nearly 80 patents have been granted in China and USA the products are enjoyed by customers in more than 60 countries and regions around the world.

GOOVIS was founded in 2015 and is engaged in providing solutions for near-eye display optics, monocular/ binocular eyepiece modules, and head-mounted displays (HMDs). The products use Micro OLED technology, providing deeper blacks and more color-accurate images, with FOV ranging from 20 to 65 degrees and resolutions from HD to 2560*1440, featuring high clarity, low distortion, low stray light, high optical efficiency, and wide range diopter adjustment, GOOVIS’ mission is to make the clearest head-mounted 3D cinema in the world, let all movies lovers enjoy the Giant HD 3D movies Anywhere Anytime.

Our founder Huajun Peng received his doctoral degree from the Center for Display Research (CDR) of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) in 2005. He has been engaged in cutting-edge work in the information display field for the past 20 years, covering OLED devices, LED local dimming BLUs, HDR algorithm systems, LCoS/OLEDOS fabrication, and near-eye display optics. Peng founded GOOVIS and serves as CEO, focusing on AR/VR optics and headsets. He has published 20 academic papers and is an inventor of 40 issued patents.

title: Dazz 3D The Most Advanced LCD SLA 3D Printer
description: Dazz 3D provides the professional-level quality and the best 3D printing experience!
allParagraphs: Dazz 3D provides the professional-level quality and the best 3D printing experience!
Dazz 3D LCD SLA 3D Printer

Many low cost 3D printers on the market make big promises, but failed to deliver the high-quality printings. That is why we created the Dazz 3D LCD 3D printer, a professional grade printer with 2K LCD panel & dual-liner slides which enable more detailed, dimensionally accurate and structurally robust models, yet is affordable to everyone.

We created Dazz 3D with consumers in mind; it includes special features such as an air-purification system, automatic resin refill, deluxe 7'' Touchscreen control, and wireless connection that make 3D printing easier and healthier!
The Advanced 3D Printer

Dazz 3D is equipped with a 2K HD LCD screen coupled with a Purple 405nm LED lamp to project slices of a 3D model onto the floor of resin container. This method allows Dazz 3D to make more detailed, dimensionally accurate and structurally robust models.
High Precision
The Layer resolution capability is up to 25 microns, XY Resolution is 47μm,  and Z resolution is 10μm.
2K Resolution
High precision, yet not comprising on printing speed. The light rate 3.8 times faster than normal light-cured resin 3D printer. The printing speed is up to 36mm/hr.
36mm/hr
The unique dual-liner slides are designed to eliminate wobbling, and create highly precise 3D models with an ultra-smooth surface.
Dual Z-Axis Slides
Dual Slides vs Single Slide
The Air-purification system includes a low-speed fan and an activated carbon filter to remove ultra-fine particles and unpleasant fumes for a healthier printing environment.
Air Purification System
You simply need to put 1 bottle of resin upside down into Dazz 3D and that’s all! The resin refills automatically as needed when printing large models.
Auto Resin System
With the deluxe 7'' touchscreen monitor on the body, users change print settings & track printing status anytime with just a simple touch control.
7" Touchscreen

The pro version includes an effective resin wiper to remove particulates and improve print consistency and quality by mixing the solid powder evenly when ceramic resin, powder, or other creative materials are added. While, when printing with Dazz 3D resins, there is no need to open the auto resin wiper due to the extension of printing time and quality it may caused.
Auto Resin Wiper

Getting started with Dazz 3D is super easy. It supports WiFi, cable, or USB driver connection. We offer free slicer software downloading on our website. Simple import the printing files and connected to Dazz 3D, you are all set.
Easy to Use
Efficient Tank Cleansing
There are two buckles at both sides, and you simply open the buckles and take the tank out  for cleansing and saving the remaining resin! For tank cleansing, 75% alcohol is preferred!
Efficient Tank Cleansing
Dazz 3D VS. Others
Comparison Chart
Affordable Resins
Dazz 3D LCD printer comes with high quality liquid resins that are very affordable. We created 6 types of high-precision resins for Dazz 3D users, with prices starting from from $19 for per 500g.
6 Types of Resins
Dazz 3D - LC09 | Standard | Green
Dazz 3D-W1 | Water Cleanable | Transparent Yellow
Dazz 3D-F20 | Smoothness | Khaki
Dazz 3D-WG5 | Rigid | Gray
Dazz 3D-HT3 | High Temp | Saffron Yellow
Dazz 3D-EC08 | Castable•HighWax | Dark Green
Dazz 3D also supports the 3rd party resins.
Development In Progress
We're an experienced team specialized in the 3D printing business for over 6 years. We have been focused on developing & manufacturing high-end professional 3D printers.
