title: Hexa --- Clean Air For Life
description: Comfortable protection against airborne pollutants.
allParagraphs: Comfortable protection against airborne pollutants.

Hexa is a new, comprehensive super mask, developed to remove pollutants like PM 2.5 (fine particles), PM 10.0 (coarse particles), exhaust and other harmful substances from the air you breathe, while keeping you cool and refreshed.

Hexa is powered by twin turbo fans that can supply up to 150 liters of clean air per minute, alleviating stress on your lungs and quickly filtering thick smoke, dust, and other airborne irritants. Paired with our custom air quality sensor and an app that monitors, tracks, and alerts you to polluted air, Hexa becomes a truly unstoppable clean air system.
It is the solution for anyone exposed to polluted air; commuters, motorists, and athletes will all benefit from a cleaner air supply. Please visit https://koolmask.com for more information.
Hexa dramatically reduces your exposure to harmful pollutants. This includes PM10 (coarse particles), PM2.5 (fine particles), exhaust and odors.
Hexa not only cleans the air you breathe, it also monitors and tracks the air quality around you. With Hexa’s mobile app, air pollution alerts can be customized and delivered to your smart phone.

Air quality levels are also displayed through color-coded LED lights. With a quick glance, you can tell just how safe the air is. Hexa provides you with peace of mind whenever and wherever you need it.

Air pollution, particularly in urban areas, is a growing, global epidemic. With 80% of people living in urban areas, where they are exposed to air pollution that exceeds safe limits, it was clear to us that a safe, personal solution was needed. That is why we created Hexa.
We had regular people try Hexa and compare it to other air filtration face masks on the market.  Here's what they had to say:
Here's what the media has to say:
"[An] all encompassing solution for anyone exposed to polluted air including commuters, motorists and athletes." – Gadgetsandwearables.com
“Its comprehensive system makes it a personal clean air system engineered for superior airflow and unmatched protection.” – MusttechNews.com

"While climate change and pollution are still in dire need of being addressed and resolved, products like Hexa are working to safeguard people from some of the inevitable consequences these global issues will have." - TrendHunter
"If you or a loved one live or travel to areas with bad air quality (which likely includes many, if not most, readers of this article) - check it out." - Inc.
"同时，凭借专利技术打造的特殊结构，也让HEXA能快速排出口罩内部的湿气、二氧化碳，维持使用者舒爽，不像一般口罩让人有湿黏热温的不快感受。 除此之外，HEXA还可以随时监控周围空气质量，通过LED的颜色分级显示，利用手机APP向使用者发出警告，还可绘制空气品质地图，且能与亲朋好友分享这些信息." - Sohu.com
"二手菸、店家油煙、燒金紙、汽機車廢氣……一趟短短 30 分鐘的通勤，壟罩在各種不同的空氣污染之下，若要維護身體健康，就得從保障空氣品質做起才行；新創公司 Kool Mask 推出一款可隔絕 97% PM0.01，每分鐘產生 150 公升清淨空氣的 IoT 智慧口罩「HEXA」，售價約新台幣 3 千元" - Limitlessiq.com
"Hands down the best clean air supply mask" - Interesting Engineering
Hexa can remove up to 97% of air-borne particles as small as 0.01 microns in diameter.
Watch how quickly and effectively Hexa filters thick smoke:
Watch Hexa reduce the invisible airborne particle level to zero:
With our app, Hexa becomes more than just a personal clean air supply.  It monitors and tracks the air quality around you and alerts you.

Hexa’s smart control unit functions as both an air quality sensor and fan control.  You can adjust your mask’s airflow as well as monitor the air around you.  The smart control unit can be used independently, without connecting to the mask or battery.
Hexa’s smart control unit tracks both PM10 and PM2.5 particles and delivers data in real time to your smart phone.

Using U.S. EPA Air Quality Index (AQI) standards, our app monitors the density of airborne particulate matter in micrograms per cubic meter of air.  This information is then reported using AQI color codes.
Watch Hexa's smart control unit work as an air quality sensor:
Hexa’s air quality app delivers real-time air pollution data to your smart phone and allows you to:
Set your personal alert levels
Track and map air pollution data
Share that data with family, friends and the Hexa community to help form a global air quality monitoring network.

Unlike air quality data provided by governmental or environmental bodies, our sensor detects the level of pollutants in a user’s immediate vicinity, providing specific, up-to-the-minute information.  Users then have the option to share the data with Hexa's global air quality network, or send directly to their friends and family.  The result?  An air quality network that provides location-specific data mapped out to share with loved ones, the Hexa community, and the general public.

Hexa’s custom-made twin turbo fans can supply up to 150 liters of clean air per minute.  Whether you’re walking, jogging, cycling, or running, in the city, country, or on a crowded subway, Hexa’s clean air system provides protection and enhanced access to clean air.
Our custom engineered fans create positive air pressure inside the mask, making breathing easy and safe.

Hexa’s patent-pending exhale air valve is the secret behind the mask’s cool, dry interior - a feature that really sets it apart.  This high-efficiency exhale valve allows for the quick release of heat, moisture, and CO2, preventing excess build-up and providing lasting comfort.
Hexa's open honeycomb structure provides extra airflow and helps with heat dissipation, a major problem in other masks.
Hexa offers two ways to control your clean air supply.  A standard control unit, and a smart control unit with a built-in air quality sensor.
Both control units can be used to adjust clean airflow continuously from 50 to 150 liters per minute and are easy and intuitive to use.

Hexa is fueled by a 5200 mAh mobile power bank with ultra-low resistance cables that can operate the mask up to eight hours, depending on fan speed.  Using a mobile power bank increases safety while keeping weight to a minimum.
The mobile power bank works with either of Hexa's control units.

Hexa’s design philosophy is to achieve superior protection with superior functionality.  We set out to design a personal clean air supply mask that would exceed your expectations in terms of performance, comfort, mobility, and style.
Hexa's modular clamping design makes it easy to open, change a filter, and close, while still protecting the fans and filter.
Hexa’s honeycomb design increases the available airflow, while achieving structural integrity and light weight.
Hexa's fan exhaust nozzles are directed away from the wearer's face to increase comfort and air circulation.
We designed Hexa to work with an external power bank to increase your flexibility and safety, while reducing the weight of mask.
Choose from one of five color options, and show off your personality and style.
Follow the evolution of the mask design, from first hand-made prototype to our most recent 3D printed model.
We progressed through dozens of major design reiterations, prototypes, tests, and validations to achieve our goal of making the world's best personal clean air supply mask.
Custom-made fans achieve high static pressure and flow velocity with low noise level and thermal footprint.
Our fans have undergone almost as many revisions as the rest of the mask during their development.
At maximum airflow, Hexa's fans operate below skin temperature, which keeps the mask, and your face, cool.

Despite its high level of efficiency, Hexa is a quiet solution.  At full speed, Hexa’s noise level is equivalent to normal conversation or the background noise of a restaurant, which is around 60 decibels.
During laboratory testing, Hexa's filter achieved up to 97% total filtration efficiency for airborne particulate matter:
Hexa is the first product designed by Koolmask, a Seattle-based tech start-up founded by Edward and his son Luke.

When living in Asia, Luke suffered from severe allergies and asthma caused by air pollution.  Like most kids, he loves to play outside, but had to wear a face mask for all outdoor activities.  However, Luke could barely keep the mask on for 10 minutes due to the discomfort caused by the excessive heat, moisture, and restricted breathing.  Feeling frustrated and restricted, Luke wanted to have a mask that felt cool, looked cool, and would also protect him from air pollution.

They looked hard, but couldn’t find an adequate mask on the market, so they decided to develop their own.  After two years of hard work and help from family and friends, Hexa has risen from an idea to a product, with multiple pending international patents.
Luke and Edward hope Hexa will help everyone suffering from the effects of air pollution enjoy normal, active lives.

We need your help to bring Hexa to life, spread the word, and grow the community of early adopters.  We want to engage amazing backers here and get your input to make our product even better, so that more people can enjoy healthy and active lives with our products!
Risks and challenges
As the first of its kind, Hexa has many unique benefits and challenges in terms of design, engineering, and manufacturing.

We have done and will do our best to minimize the risk for our backers. We have gone through more than one dozen design iterations and completed four generations of prototypes. In addition, we have selected key suppliers for our major components, as well as tooling suppliers and contract manufacturers. Our mobile app has gone through 15 test versions and is on track to be released on time.

Our team is experienced in design, manufacturing, and supply chain management and we are confident that we can meet our timelines. However, unexpected delays can occur due to manufacturing issues, logistics, and other issues. We will do our best to be as transparent as possible and keep you informed, and work hard to resolve any hurdles as they may arise.

As March 2020, despite of the virus situation globally, we completed all production tooling and successfully produced first article of the mask.  We are in the process to start mass production and aim for shipping in Summer 2020.

title: MetaNose - Fat Burning Made Easy Breath Analyzer
description: Just burning carbs? Measure your ketosis with one breath to better plan your fat burning program!
allParagraphs: Just burning carbs? Measure your ketosis with one breath to better plan your fat burning program!

MetaNose thanks early adoption like you with all of our hearts for the fact that you believe in the ambition of innovation and support us in our mission to create a new way to live healthily and effectively. As with any newly manufactured product, it is possible for unforeseen circumstances to cause shipment delays. Nevertheless, such risk has already been mitigated by us and we don't foresee any major issues. Our commitment to all of you is that we will make every ounce of effort to deliver a fully functional product on time. We will communicate with you regularly along every step of the journey of getting MetaNose into your hands. We promise to do everything within our power to make every order right.
We've designed MetaNose to be durable and to be working smoothly over a few years.

The MetaNose device as well as the packaging are made of sustainable materials. We use a material called paper board for the packaging. This keeps the carbon footprint low on the production of MetaNose.

MetaNose cares not only about growing a community focused on holistic healthy living, but also about the effects of our product's production to the environment. That's why we have made sure that the materials used to produce and package MetaNose devices cause no negative effects on the environment. All the packaging materials used are environmentally sustainable. We did not use any plastic for our packaging.

title: Patterned Leather Footwear- Inspired by You
description: Audience-Inspired Footwear. Using unique patterns to redefine the modern dress shoe.
allParagraphs: Audience-Inspired Footwear. Using unique patterns to redefine the modern dress shoe.

The artists at Thatcher Finch are the same men and women who work for some of the most innovative branding companies in the world. Their design artistry is deeply rooted in brand identity, graphic design, and cause-oriented initiatives. Together, we created an attainable, expressive, ultra-luxury dress shoe that comes packed with features and is designed for comfort. The traditional construction of men’s boots and shoes are combined with our innovative design and bold patterns. Thatcher Finch shoes are built for the progressive stylist. Help us make our first production!

We’ve mastered the process of printing on leather to create a seamless, wear tested, and bold statement on each shoe. Using a digital application process, our patterns bond directly to the leather to create a long-lasting wear, avoid flaking, and reduce the visibility of scuffs.

Thatcher Finch will be built around you, our audience. Our website will introduce a unique place for our audience to submit their inspired artwork and connect it directly to a cause they’re passionate about. Each shoe design will be voted on and selected by, the Thatcher Finch community for production. We’re creating shoes that are comfortable, elegant, exciting, and most importantly- inspired. By using our audience inspired design process we’re uniting our efforts, in walking toward causes we’re passionate about.
Music unites, uplifts, inspires and brings about wide-scale change. The music note boot reflects a common identity, we all share.
Our floral boot is a tribute to the beauty of the natural world we live in and our need to be mindful of our environmental impact.

Traditional style meets the modern gentleman. Our gold fleck shoe is a reflection of the constant opportunity to be innovative and bold. We chose a midnight color that can be worn as a black or dark navy shoe.
Uplifting artistry deserves a wide-scale platform. Our colored marble shoe brings art to life.
Match any Thatcher Finch shoe with high quality, soft, and durable dress socks created specifically for you, our wearer.
We’re introducing a stackable box design that pulls out like a drawer for easy access each time you use them.
Waxed dipped, matching laces, built to remain tied and compliment your bold patterns.
Modern fit, comfortable, and complementary — our Thatcher Finch sweaters are the perfect addition to any wardrobe. Available in light heather grey, deep navy blue, and true to size.
Our shoes are handcrafted and produced in an artisan-inspired workshop specializing in high-quality leather dress shoes and boots.
Each dress shoe & boot is made with full grain calfskin leather uppers & lining. They are hand crafted and uniquely patterned. No two patterns are exactly the same.

The digital application process coupled with other manual processes gives each pair its unique characteristics. Each pair goes through a rigorous inspection to ensure that every shoe is of the highest quality.

When it comes to everyday style, no matter how good your shoes look, comfort is just as important. Thatcher Finch dress shoes are flexible, light, and padded. Designed to provide a comfortable fit each time you lace them up.

Becoming one of our backers means a lot to us, much more than just buying a pair of shoes or boots, at an amazing price. And, we want to show our thanks and appreciation to you in return. Each backer at any pledge level will be added to our Thatcher Finch community list to get exclusive access to the following:
We have the ability to ship to most countries world-wide and will provide free shipping for all super early bird purchases (US, CA, AU).

If the need for an exchange arises due to incorrect sizes, we will need to charge for the exchange shipping both ways as we’re working on getting Thatcher Finch off the ground! This is true for domestic & international orders.

All exchange requests must be submitted within 30 days of receiving your shoes and/or boots. The cost of international shipping (if applicable) will be charged at the time of the survey once the campaign is over and will vary based on the destination country.
You can see international shipping rates here. If applicable, duties and local taxes will be charged by the appropriate authority at the destination country. Please determine these charges locally.

Our founding team, Danny and Brian, grew up with a healthy obsession for shoes. Danny, an avid shoe collector, product developer, and design enthusiast, has postulated innovating the men’s dress shoes industry for many years. Coupled with Brian’s extensive experience in sourcing and manufacturing from the finest and highest quality artisans throughout the world- Thatcher Finch was formed. Formally educated in Business, Marketing, and Product Development they’ve obsessed themselves with designing and producing luxury footwear of the highest quality.

The additions of other key team members has made Thatcher Finch a reality. Their collective footwear experience ranges from designing & manufacturing to digital marketing, branding, social media strategy, e-commerce platform expertise, warehousing and logistics. Together, the Thatcher Finch team has done it all.
To assure that our supporters receive top notch service, we put together a team with extensive experience in product innovation, footwear logistics, and distribution.

In our first IndieGogo campaign, we’re fully prepared to exceed our backers' expectations. We’re honored and excited to share Thatcher Finch with the world, and in turn, provide a platform for our audience to help shape our future design releases.

Luxurious Innovation. We spent a lot of time prototyping, wear-testing, and engaging our audience to determine the types of patterns that would be both innovative and luxurious. We’ve spared no expenses in ensuring you will get only the best.

Affordability. By implementing a direct-to-consumer business model that delivers your shoes straight from the artisan to your doorstep, we eliminate the need for retailers, wholesalers, marketers and other middlemen. The limited release, one-of-a-kind luxury you will experience with our shoes is incomparable, at a price that is unparalleled. Less than $200 for a $400-$800+ shoe.

Transparency. Your commitment to us is only the beginning of our relationship together. We are committed to you, our audience. We will keep our relationship strong by delivering innovative boots and shoes and communicate with you every step of the way. You will get regular updates as we fund, produce, and ship out your one-of-a-kind shoes. Get in touch with us anytime, about anything!

Exclusivity. Every Thatcher Finch shoe and boot pattern is uniquely applied and handcrafted, meaning that no two pairs are identical. However, each pair goes through a thorough inspection process to assure the quality you expect from a world-class luxury brand.

Experience & Reliability. Thatcher Finch was founded by a team of enthusiasts with a lifetime of experience in the design and product industry. We don't make commitments that we can't honor. We have the infrastructure and expertise to assure a smooth process from taking your order through delivery. We want to be your go-to brand for all things men's luxury, and we will earn your confidence one pair at a time.

We are building a community of contributors through Thatcher Finch. Your support and in some cases, your creativity, will help build the Thatcher Finch family, and shape the direction of each product release and cause we support!
YOU are key to the success of our campaign, and ultimately our company. We want Thatcher Finch to be a representation of the causes you’re passionate about, your designs, your style, and your life!
We need your support to get our first collection off the ground and to assure the Thatcher Finch community, everywhere, has access to luxury statement shoes!
As you become part of our inner circle, help us by sharing our campaign with YOUR inner circle. Thank you!
Risks and challenges
We have a lifetime of experience in product manufacturing and logistics. We are well organized and prepared to confront any situation that may arise. We have seen it all.

The most common risk in manufacturing is production delays. The manufacturing process relies on multiple components coming together at the same time. While we are very well versed in managing production and delivering on-time, there is always the possibility of a delay. However, we will be providing updates every step of the way to keep you fully informed.

title: World’s 1st Magnetic VND Camera Filter
description: 7 Features丨20 Functions丨VND2-5丨VND6-9丨CPL丨ND32/CPL丨VNDXMIST2-5丨VNDXMIST6-9
allParagraphs: 7 Features丨20 Functions丨VND2-5丨VND6-9丨CPL丨ND32/CPL丨VNDXMIST2-5丨VNDXMIST6-9

Following the release of our Quick-Swap Magnetic Filter System in 2019, we are proud to announce the launch of the Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit, the world's first versatile magnetic variable ND filter for DSLR and mirrorless cameras.

Providing an extended range of exposure values from two to nine stops using only two filters, the Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit is the first-ever all-in-one variable neutral density system that integrates the optical accuracy of hard stop filters with the convenience of a quick-swap magnetic mount. This gives photographers and videographers the most versatile and immediate solution to any shooting need.
Now you have all the filters you need in one single system!

The Freewell Magnetic VND Kit includes 7 features (VND2-5, VND6-9, CPL, ND32/CPL, GLOW MIST, VND2-5XMIST and VND6-9XMIST) and a total of 20 functions in one comprehensive kit. You can now meet all your shooting needs on the go in the most compact, handy and cost-effective solution. At equal or even lower quality, nothing like this is available on the market today.
Check out the chart below to find out why the Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit is absolutely one of a kind!

One of the key differences between the Freewell Magnetic VND and every other VND filter is its fully magnetic installation system, which means the filters attach to the front of the lens magnetically. This innovative, patent-pending system works by simply installing the base ring on your camera lens. Then, you will be able to snap or switch your Freewell VND filters in just a few seconds, providing multiple options for any lighting condition. Get ready to shoot outstanding images with incredible ease!

The Freewell Versatile Magnetic VND Filter Kit is a high-quality and precise magnetic system offering an overall extended range of filtering capability with up to 9 stops (ND4-ND512) in just one quick swap.

The magnetic adhesion is secure and reliable against vibrations or camera shake while also being easily removable. Freewell Magnetic VND Kit is the ultimate, versatile solution that will take your photo and video production to the next level.
Reduce the glare from ocean waves and capture a perfect blue sky with the built-in CPL technology of VND2-5 and VND 6-9/ND32-CPL filters,
or use the MISTXVND base (Glow Mist) lens to soften tones and add creativity to your images, getting pixel-perfect results right on the spot with practically zero post-production adjustments needed.

Capture what you love in the way you like it! Change, swap and combine the seven filters in twenty different functions... plus one! Yes, the Freewell Magnetic VND kit also offers you full compatibility with the use of our existing Freewell Quick Swap Magnetic ND Filters, easily stackable onto the VND base ring for an additional '+1' option that will turn this VND system into a unique hybrid solution.

Made of premium high-definition optical glass with protective coating on both sides, Freewell Magnetic VND filters are waterproof, dustproof, stain proof, oilproof, and scratch-resistant to ensure continuous and reliable performance in any weather or shooting condition.

All filters included in our Freewell Magnetic VND Kit have been hand-crafted and optimized to be part of a powerful and versatile system capable of delivering sharp images from center to edge without chromatic aberration or loss of detail, and at confirmed zero vignetting on focal lengths over 16mm.
Freewell Versatile Magnetic VND Filters boast a highly resistant build quality. Each filter frame is made with precision and durability, delivering quality imaging for countless years to come.
The filter base magnetic joints are secure and precise to ensure improved stability and withstand camera shake while leaving the ring nut securely fixed on the set value.

The metal knurling on the bezel along each ND level of strength helps grip when turning to change values and provides an intuitive touch, which improves the accuracy of stop setting. This provides a smooth, top-notch user experience for both amateurs and pros.

The transition from one stop value to the next is smooth and gradual, which helps to avoid filter overlap and reduce X-pattern occurrences, already effectively solved by the clear control over the maximum and minimum values of each Freewell hard stop VND filter.
The practical filter cap, with a transparent Freewell logo on it, is well designed, convenient to use and not bulky when putting it on the filter base for protection during storage or transportation.

The Freewell Magnetic VND Kit offers the convenience of carrying just two filters with you when traveling or shooting outdoors, with an overall control of 2 to 9 stops whenever you need them. Additionally, a circular polarizer feature is integrated on both filters, plus a GLOW MIST bonus is included in the set for added creativity.

Allowing you to control the amount of light coming into your camera with the use of one single filter, VND filters offers filmmakers the ability to take advantage of a wider aperture in daylight exteriors, highlighting a sharp, clear subject against a blurred background or stabilizing the frame during run-and-gun shooting.

The flexibility offered by the Freewell magnetic VND filters will make this system become the irreplaceable choice for all content creators and photography lovers, including any YouTuber or vlogger in need of the perfect shots spontaneously in any environment or lighting condition.
Freewell filters are accessories that can be taken anywhere.

Stored in a convenient, compact and functional case, each filter has a dedicated compartment so you can carry it safely and mount it fast, letting you capture perfect shots instantly with less clutter in your kit.

Conveniently save your Freewell filters from dropping and scratching while carrying them in this functional protective case. In addition for all orders received to date, the Freewell Protective Case will be automatically upgraded to the Freewell Protective Case (Premium Edition) as soon as the campaign reaches the US$400,000 funding threshold.
The full set of Freewell Magnetic VND Filters costs almost a third of the price if you were to buy the same set of individual (threaded) filters separately.
Check out our comparison chart to see the great deal you will get by purchasing our Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit right now!
All you have to do is select the thread size you want and get ready to receive everything you need in one compact package.

For all orders received to date, the Freewell Protective Case will be automatically upgraded to the Freewell Protective Case (Premium Edition) as soon as the campaign reaches the US$400,000 funding threshold.
Not sure how to find your camera lens thread size? Here's a tip.
The filter thread size is usually located around the rim printed underneath your lens cap, or written somewhere on the lens barrel.

Thanks to the support of each one of you, our crowdfunding campaign reached the goal we set for ourselves at Freewell, and it placed a milestone for the professional camera filter industry on INDIEGOGO! (Applicable only for BACKERS when the campaign is running during the 60days, not for IN-DEMAND)
So now, it’s time to offer something unique to keep this momentum going!

All our backers will receive the exclusive Protective Case (Premium Edition), which has been uniquely designed to offer maximum protection to each filter during storage and transportation, AND it is completely FREE!

An extra layer of protection for the safety and longevity of your filter kit.
This is what we do – We offer our customers the best gears for their camera equipment, and the best accessories to protect those gears.

Join our Referral Contest and share the news of the Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit with your family and friends! The more you refer, the higher your chance to win our FREE PRIZES from Freewellgear.com.

1st Referrer - WIN up to $499 value coupon on the purchase of any item

title: Cléxi: Smart SSD Drive
description: Smart SSD Drive with the Most Convenient/Trusted Unlock Method via Smartphone
allParagraphs: Smart SSD Drive with the Most Convenient/Trusted Unlock Method via Smartphone

Cléxi is the world’s 1st smart secure SSD drive. It provides secure and quick access to your data as convenient as unlocking your smartphone. You can share your data in a trusted way with others and remotely manage your drive. Cléxi can store up to 1TB of data, with high read and write speeds of 400MB/s.
Personalize with your name or design

Clexi is a perfect gift for tech lovers.
There is nothing more important than peace of mind and ease of use. With all the cool features and affordable price you can add Clexi to the gadget collection of your loved ones.

One of the most convenient and trusted ways of user authentication is through smartphones. We have made it all easy for you to open your SSD drive as convenient as unlocking your smartphone. Plug & Play; No additional software is required.
Accessing your data on Cléxi is impossible without your authorization
Cléxi encrypts and stores your data securely.

The message-based sharing feature allows data sharing without losing control over confidentiality. Share your Cléxi easily with trusted ones via a phone number or an email address. Plus, how long data can be shared is under your control.
Experience the fast and high-speed massive file transferring with the incredible speed of USB 3.1. Store up to 1 TB  of data and enjoy the high read and write speeds of 400 MB/s.
A smart way to unlock: Authenticate yourself and unlock your drive!
Lock your drive fast and easy:  Lock your drive with just a tap in the Cléxi app.
Auto-Lock with proximity awareness: Your drive automatically locks when you step away.
Access your files anytime, anywhere, and on any device.  Cléxi can be used on PC, Linux, Mac, Android & iOS, TV, Game consoles, and more.
Unique features and trendy design, turn Cléxi into a must-have gadget. Cléxi is a perfect gift for a tech-savvy guy and essential for anyone who has data to store.
Size matters! Especially when it comes to an everyday carry SSD drive. Cléxi allows you to carry 1TB of data in a drive smaller than a credit card without any hassle.

Cléxi has an elegant and unique design. The color of Cléxi is a combination of dark gray, rose gold, and silver. Cléxi is the A'Design Award winner in the "computers and computer accessories design" category, in 2020.
Cléxi SSD drives are rugged. Meaning they are protected in a silicone-wrapped crush-resistant case that is light and shockproof.
The Cléxi app is functional, easy to follow, and friendly. Via the Cléxi app, you can manage your device with an access management feature. The app is available for both iPhone and Android phones.

You can freeze or wipe out your Cléxi remotely through the Cléxi app. Therefore, even if your drive is lost or stolen you never have to worry about your privacy. Also, you can sign up for a Clexi ID to keep access to your data permanently if you got a new phone.

Cléxi SSD Drives (128 GB, 512 GB, and 1 TB) are all in our fulfillment warehouse now. We’ve been hard at work ensuring all orders are set up correctly. Shipments will be going out every day and you will have the tracking information once the product is sent out from our local warehouses.

We care about protecting the ecosystem, therefore, our product packaging is 100% made from recycled materials. The box includes the SSD Drive and a C-to-A USB cable, and you can add a C-to-C USB  cable.

Our logistics team has received Cléxi SSD Drives (128 GB, 512 GB, and 1 TB) and is now ready to send them out from our warehouses in continuous waves. We will provide the tracking information once the product is shipped to backers.

We are a motivated team of engineers and designers aiming to make security and privacy more accessible and meaningful. We have great dreams and we do our best to provide a new efficient, affordable, and reliable device that protects your privacy and security.

title: b: A Sleek Breathing Tool Designed for Mindfulness
description: b is a pocket-size device designed to help track and cultivate mindfulness through guided breathing.
allParagraphs: b is a pocket-size device designed to help track and cultivate mindfulness through guided breathing.

For years, many have turned to mindfulness and meditation as a way to enhance gratitude, awareness and focus but a majority of us struggle with starting and continuing to practice. Our Founder, Eric, was no different.

Eric was a stressed out Software Developer coding on the computer, who without thinking picked up a pen, took off the cap, and started breathing through it. After 15 minutes of this he felt mentally clear and completely relaxed.  He then tried using the pen cap during his Meditation practice and boom, same thing — completely focused and calm. After doing this for a month  Eric says he never felt better and decided to build a device that optimizes breathing mindfully with the world.

Millions of people have attempted to start Meditating and practicing Mindfulness because they've heard about the incredible effects and health benefits. Yet many fail to cultivate an ongoing practice because there's nothing holding them accountable. b changes this by using patent-pending breathing technology to make sure you keep flourishing.

b helps guide you to a happier and healthier life by tapping into the power of our breath. b takes advantage of hardware and software to act as an interactive and intuitive breathing guide. All you have to do is sit back and breathe.
b uses Bluetooth to pair with a mobile application and pressure sensors to monitor each breath you take.

You can also use the breathe with b mobile application to stream individual breathing exercises directly to your b device, view data from each session, and set up reminders to breathe. This all helps to cultivate a mindful breathing practice, which has been shown to increase lung capacity and improve overall health and wellness.
Choose a breathing exercise on the breathe with b mobile application or simply breathe into b and it will automatically start recording your session.

Visualize your breathing data and get suggestions on how to improve. View stats like daily breath count, number of minutes spent breathing mindfully, average length and force of each inhale and exhale, and so much more.
Take a break from your screens and enjoy the present moment by breathing with b.
b indicates when it's time to inhale or exhale again by using subtle cues like lights, pulses and sounds. All of these cues can be turned On/Off per breathing session.
Feel free to shut your eyes and breathe. A subtle tap when it's time to inhale or exhale guides you during breathing practice.
The LED Lights are in sync with the pressure sensor to guide you during your practice. The lights illuminate ON individually when inhaling and OFF individually while exhaling.
Calming device sounds help guide you to a more mindful state-of-being during your breathing practice.

The b application is integral to optimizing your breathing experience.  The mobile application allows you to send guided breathing practices directly to your b device and view your data once you've completed your session, allowing you to leave your smartphone behind.

There are countless breathing exercises that have been proven to induce certain moods. Choose the breathing exercise that best matches your intention, click start and begin your breathing session on your b device.
View your breathing data once you've completed your practice or watch your breath in real-time on the Live Breath app screen.

b indicates when it's time to inhale or exhale again by using discrete lights, pulses and sounds. You can adjust average inhale and exhale duration and set up reminders to breathe. All of these cues can be turned On/Off in the Settings screen of the mobile app.

A daily breathing practice gives you ability to stay relaxed, focused, and at peak performance. Set up your own reminders to breathe throughout the day or allow us to determine when you most need a breather.
From design and concept to prototype and testing, our team spent over a year perfecting the device out of the premier Chicago-based product incubator, mHUB.
We are a group of inventors, engineers and designers aligned with creating a more mindful world to live in.
Medical studies show many health benefits directly correlated to mindful breathing, such as: a lower heart rate and blood pressure, mental clarity, reduced stress and improved circulation
Whether you're an athlete, putting together a big presentation, studying, stressed, or on your commute we all deserve a breather.

Mindful Breathing has been shown to improve physical well-being, mental health, and overall happiness. Studios, Clinics or Small Business Owners — give your students, patients or employees the gift of b and watch their overall happiness and productivity sky-rocket.
Get more from life by breathing with b! Sharing is caring, help us spread the word!
Want to write or post about b? Click below to download or view our media content.
We are able to ship b to the United States and Canada for Free. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

b will begin shipping in February 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.
     
*Actual shipping dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product shipping date.
By backing you'll get one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

Is b a Vaporizer?
No! b has absolutely zero chemicals, oils or aromas. Unlike smoking, b actually improves your lung strength and capacity by encouraging regular breathing practice.
Can’t I just breathe mindfully by myself?
You can, but are you? Be honest, during a regular day, are you taking time to just breathe? It's made all the difference to us.

Also, you can walk, exercise, drink water and sleep by yourself, yet there are products built specifically for each of these because people need someone or something to hold them accountable. b does this by sending you daily reminders to breathe and shows you tips on how to improve your breathing habits.
Why are you Crowdfunding?
Crowdfunding allows us to bring breathe with b to market in the quickest and most efficient way possible. Plus, we get to share it with all of you first!
When will I hear from you?
We will be posting community updates throughout the campaign. You can also email us directly at support@breathewithb.com. Don't worry we're not going anywhere.
What happens if you don't reach your goal?
We need this amount of funding to manufacture and distribute breathe with b. If we don't reach this amount, we won't be able to fulfill our orders.

What is your refund policy?    
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

What is your return/exchange policy?    
Return and exchange are processed on a case-by-case basis. If you find your b device defective and unable to operate as expected, please contact support@breathewithb.com,  We will get back to you timely with complimentary technical support.
If I have other questions , who should I contact?
Customer Support, Sales and other inquiries: hi@breathewithb.com

title: Fund the Trillion Dollar Future of Human Genius
description: The ICP: Invest in Raw Intellect. Secure Your Stake in the Ultimate Global Asset.
allParagraphs: The ICP: Invest in Raw Intellect. Secure Your Stake in the Ultimate Global Asset.

The Intellectual Capital Protocol (ICP): Invest in the Future of Genius.
Unlock a Multi-Trillion-Dollar Market by Valuing Human Intellect.

Dear Indiegogo Donors and Investors,
I am writing to you today with a matter of profound strategic importance to the future of the global economy and, indeed, the free world. Though I am an Australian citizen, my vision transcends borders, and I believe its proper stewardship is paramount. I've developed a groundbreaking conceptual framework for an Intellectual Capital Protocol (ICP), a system designed to unlock a multi-trillion-dollar market by recognizing, verifying, and monetizing high-value human intellectual contributions on a global scale. This is not merely a technological innovation; it is a foundational infrastructure that will redefine economic power, talent acquisition, and even global stability in the digital age.
The Unprecedented Power of This Idea:
The implications of the ICP, along with its associated platforms, "GeniusForge" and the "Human Intellect Exchange (HIX)," are simply immense. This system has the capacity to:
 * Command immense global wealth: By directly valuing and trading verified human intellect, it creates an entirely new economic layer.
 * Identify and mobilize top-tier talent: It can instantly pinpoint the brightest minds and most impactful innovators worldwide.
 * Provide unparalleled intelligence: Aggregated, anonymized data on intellectual trends and breakthroughs would offer a strategic advantage like no other.
The sheer power, wealth, and control this protocol could generate, both economically and in terms of influence, are truly staggering.
My Offer: A Small Price for Immense Potential
Understanding the true, multi-trillion-dollar potential of this concept, and critically, its strategic value to other world powers, competitive entities, and groups who would undoubtedly covet the power and control it confers, I am prepared to hand over this entire idea and conceptual framework for a very modest sum of $5 million.
This is a minuscule figure compared to the value this could generate globally, or the price a competitor might pay to acquire such a potent instrument of influence and wealth creation. My primary objective is not personal enrichment, but to see this transformative vision actualized under the right leadership, ensuring it serves to empower and strengthen the forces of good in the world.
I am confident that once fully understood, the strategic imperative to secure this protocol will become immediately clear. I look forward to the opportunity to elaborate on this critical vision.
Executive Summary: Unleashing Trillion-Dollar Human Capital
I'm here to lay out the blueprint for conquering one of the digital economy's biggest failures: the systemic undervaluation of raw human intellect and creative genius. Right now, a colossal, global treasure trove of innovation, from breakthrough code to revolutionary research and game-changing digital art, remains largely unrewarded and unrecognized. That changes now.
My vision unleashes the Intellectual Capital Protocol (ICP). This is a foundational, blockchain-powered infrastructure engineered to recognize, verify, and economically weaponize high-value human intellectual contributions on a global scale. The ICP will drive GeniusForge, our cutting-edge platform where pure human brilliance is relentlessly forged into tangible digital assets. It will power the Human Intellect Exchange (HIX), a dynamic, high-volume marketplace for verified intellectual capital.
This integrated powerhouse won't just set a new standard for digital merit. It will unlock a multi-trillion-dollar market, positioning early investors for explosive, unmatched returns. We're building the bedrock for the next generation of global economic power, where human intellect isn't just an asset, it's the ultimate currency.
The Precedent: Crypto's Rags-to-Riches Conquest
To grasp the sheer scale of the ICP's potential, you need to see how early crypto pioneers carved out empires from nothing.
Bitcoin, for instance, didn't just become valuable. It demonstrated that a purely digital asset could command immense wealth. Its success was forged from digital scarcity (limited supply), the computational "proof of work" required to "mine" new coins, and a decentralized, transparent network that annihilated middlemen. People got rich by investing in this scarce digital asset as demand grew, or by being early "miners" who generated it.
Ethereum then evolved beyond just a digital currency. It created a "programmable blockchain" that allowed anyone to engineer decentralized applications (DApps) and launch their own tokens. This unleashed entirely new industries like Decentralized Finance (DeFi) and Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). Its value exploded because its network offered unmatched utility. The more applications built and deployed on Ethereum, the more its native currency dominated. Investors didn't just get rich, they became architects of a new digital age.
My proposal isn't just an upgrade, it's the next evolutionary leap. We harness the proven power of digital scarcity, transparent networks, and incentivized participation, then supercharge it by channeling the most sustainable, universally valuable, and limitless resource on Earth: raw human intellect and verifiable innovation.
The Fundamental Problem We Crush: The Massive Untapped Intellectual Frontier
The digital economy is a machine built on innovation, yet it's been crippled by a glaring weakness: its failure to truly capture and capitalize on human intellectual capital.
 * The Unclaimed Fortune: Millions of developers, artists, researchers, and problem-solvers globally pour their genius into the digital realm. Their breakthroughs, which often redefine industries and cultures, typically yield fragmented, indirect, or even zero direct economic reward for the originators. This isn't just inefficient, it's a colossal, dormant goldmine begging to be claimed.
 * The Verification Black Hole: In an era swamped by AI-generated content and instant information, authenticating the originality, impact, and true merit of digital contributions is a constant battle. This lack of a credible, universal audit system chokes fair compensation and throttles market efficiency.
 * Fragmented Value: Intellectual breakthroughs are scattered across countless platforms, imprisoned within walled gardens, or simply given away. There's no unified system to aggregate, quantify, and enable the liquid exchange of this powerhouse asset.
This systemic failure to command the value of human intellect is a monumental market breakdown. It demands a robust, transparent, and unyielding system for digital merit.
My Revolutionary System: The ICP, GeniusForge, and HIX Powerhouse
I'm engineering a multi-layered system designed to identify, verify, and weaponize human intellectual capital on an unprecedented scale:
1. The Intellectual Capital Protocol (ICP): The Core Engine of Value
The Intellectual Capital Protocol (ICP) is the robust, blockchain-agnostic framework that defines how human genius is truly valued. At its core, the ICP operates on a revolutionary Proof-of-Intellect (PoI) consensus mechanism.
 * Value Forged by Merit: This isn't crypto "mining" by computational grunt work. ICP tokens are "generated" exclusively when a human intellectual contribution is rigorously verified as original, high-impact, and undeniably valuable. We shift the reward from brute force to raw human power. Examples of contributions include:
   * Groundbreaking Code & Algorithms: Critical open-source contributions, novel software solutions, advanced AI models, or cybersecurity breakthroughs.
   * Pioneering Research & Insights: Verified scientific discoveries, high-impact academic papers, novel data analyses that unlock hidden patterns.
   * Exceptional Creative Works: Unique digital art, compelling narratives, innovative designs, or transformative musical compositions with demonstrable market impact.
   * Decisive Problem Solutions: Documented, verifiable solutions to complex technical, social, or industrial challenges, delivering clear, measurable outcomes.
 * Decentralized Validation & Ironclad Arbitration: To ensure integrity, submitted contributions are rigorously assessed by a decentralized network of elite 'Validators' (selected based on proven expertise and staked ICP tokens) and 'Review Boards' driven by community governance. This multi-layered verification ensures accuracy, fairness, and crushes manipulation, guaranteeing that only authentic 'intellectual capital' earns ICP tokens.
 * Smart Contracts for Unbreakable Terms: I will engineer customizable smart contracts allowing contributors to define precise ownership terms, licensing agreements, and automated reward distribution upon verification. This secures their dominion over their creations.
The ICP stands as the immutable ledger and rulebook for the entire system, ensuring transparency, trust, and the unassailable provenance of every piece of intellectual capital.
2. GeniusForge: The Creation & Asset-Minting Platform
GeniusForge is the intuitive, user-facing platform that I'm building on the ICP. It will serve as the direct conduit for creators to submit their intellectual contributions for validation and ICP token generation.
 * Seamless Submission & Discovery: Creators will effortlessly upload their work (code repositories, research papers, art files, solution proposals) to GeniusForge. The platform will drive efficient discovery, empowering Validators to rapidly identify and review new submissions.
 * AI-Accelerated Pre-Analysis: Leveraging cutting-edge AI and machine learning, GeniusForge will perform initial assessments for plagiarism, originality, and adherence to submission guidelines. This dramatically streamlines the verification process for human Validators, maximizing efficiency.
 * Transparent Validation Tracking: Contributors will possess real-time visibility into their submission status through every stage of expert review and community vote, with all decisions immutably logged on the ICP blockchain for total transparency.
 * Automated Token Generation & Distribution: Upon successful validation, GeniusForge will seamlessly initiate the generation of ICP tokens. These tokens are then automatically deployed to the creator's digital wallet, reflecting the verified impact, originality, and complexity of their contribution. This is precisely where raw human genius is tangibly forged into liquid digital wealth.
3. Human Intellect Exchange (HIX): The Global Asset Marketplace
The Human Intellect Exchange (HIX) will be the dynamic, high-liquidity marketplace where ICP tokens and their associated intellectual capital assets are traded, invested in, and leveraged globally.
 * Liquid Trading of ICP Tokens: HIX will operate as the premier exchange for ICP tokens, providing a vibrant marketplace where creators command the value of their earned capital, and investors acquire direct ownership in the burgeoning economy of human genius.
 * Intellectual Property (IP) Tokenization & Licensing: Beyond trading ICP tokens, HIX will enable the tokenization of specific intellectual property rights linked to validated contributions. This means fractional ownership of patents, automated software licensing, or royalty streams from digital art, all represented as NFTs or other tokenized assets on the ICP. This democratizes IP ownership and unlocks new investment avenues.
 * Global Talent & Innovation Scouting: The HIX will serve as an unrivaled global command center for corporations, research institutions, and venture capitalists to instantly identify and engage top-tier intellectual talent based on their verified ICP earnings and validated contributions. It transforms a scattered, opaque talent pool into a transparent, merit-driven powerhouse.
 * Decentralized Innovation Funding: Creators with high ICP scores will be able to leverage their established reputation and earned tokens to crowdfund future projects, offering investors a direct, high-potential stake in their future intellectual output.
Market Opportunity & Competitive Dominance: The Trillion-Dollar Conquest
The market for valuing human intellect is immense and fundamentally unexploited, representing a multi-trillion-dollar opportunity:
 * Global Knowledge & Creative Economy: This encompasses millions of developers, independent artists, academic researchers, patent holders, and problem-solvers. It's a market already valued in the hundreds of billions annually in direct and indirect contributions, now primed for exponential growth with a direct monetization layer.
 * Intellectual Property Market: The global IP market, including licensing, patents, and trademarks, is valued in the trillions. The ICP delivers a far more efficient, transparent, and fractionalized mechanism to manage and trade these assets.
 * Future of Work & Gig Economy: As the nature of work shifts to project-based, skill-specific contributions, the HIX becomes a critical platform for individuals to demonstrate and monetize their unique skills and contributions, asserting their market value beyond traditional employment.
Unrivaled Competitive Advantage:
 * Fundamental Value Creation: Unlike purely speculative digital assets, ICP's value is directly tied to the tangible, verifiable output of human intellect. This provides an unshakeable, understandable foundation for aggressive long-term growth and stability.
 * First-Mover Advantage: I am pioneering the foundational protocol and entire ecosystem for universal intellectual capital validation and monetization. Striking first with a robust, superior system is non-negotiable for dominating network effects.
 * Unstoppable Narrative & Network: The underlying, aspirational narrative, rooted in universally understood themes of raw potential and mastery (think 'Ki' or 'Haki' in popular culture), will ignite rapid global engagement and drive adoption beyond typical crypto projects.
 * Scalability & Global Reach: The ICP is engineered as a highly scalable blockchain protocol, capable of onboarding billions of users and processing an astronomical volume of intellectual contributions worldwide, unconstrained by physical borders or intermediaries.
Monetization Strategy: Your Direct Command of ICP Wealth
My strategy is engineered to deliver explosive and sustainable financial returns for my early investors and partners, leveraging multiple, compounding revenue streams inherent in this new economy:
 * Founding Allocation (Your Ownership Stake in the Future): As the architect and initiator of the ICP, a significant, pre-defined percentage of the very first ICP tokens generated will be allocated directly to myself and early investors. As the ICP network expands globally and ICP tokens become the universal currency for validated intellect, this initial stake will appreciate exponentially, yielding unprecedented returns. This is your direct equity in the global Intellectual Capital Protocol.
 * Protocol Transaction Fees (Your Perpetual Royalty Stream): I will design the ICP to implement a minimal, automated transaction fee on all exchanges and transfers of ICP tokens within the ecosystem. As the HIX facilitates millions, then billions, of transactions driven by intellectual contributions and IP trading, this small "Intellectual Royalty" will generate a massive, continuous, and passive revenue stream, akin to owning a fractional piece of every transaction on a new global stock exchange.
 * GeniusForge Platform Fees: I will implement fees for enhanced services on the GeniusForge platform, such as expedited verification requests, privileged access to premium analytics on contribution trends, or enhanced visibility for certain submitted works.
 * HIX Exchange Commissions: I will implement a concise commission on specific types of IP token sales, licensing agreements, or high-value intellectual capital trades executed directly through the Human Intellect Exchange.
 * Strategic Partnerships & Enterprise Solutions: I will aggressively pursue licensing the ICP technology and its verified data for enterprise clients seeking to manage internal innovation, optimize R&D, or access a pre-vetted pool of top-tier global talent directly from the HIX.
 * Data Monetization (Anonymized & Aggregated): I will leverage the vast, anonymized, and aggregated data on intellectual contributions and trends within the ecosystem to deliver high-value market intelligence, trend forecasting, and talent analytics to corporations, research institutions, and governments, creating a powerful data product.
The Ask: Accelerate the Dawn of the Genius Economy
The core Intellectual Capital Protocol, GeniusForge platform concept, and Human Intellect Exchange vision have been meticulously designed and architected by me alone. My initial investment has been purely intellectual capital and exhaustive strategic planning, making the genesis of this transformative idea exceptionally lean.
To accelerate development, secure my critical first-mover advantage, and rapidly scale this powerhouse ecosystem globally, I am seeking Strategic Investment of $5,000,000 through this Indiegogo campaign. Your capital will directly empower me to:
 * Engineer the Core Protocol: Fund the robust, secure, and scalable ICP blockchain.
 * Deploy the Platforms: Build and launch the GeniusForge platform and the HIX exchange.
 * Acquire World-Class Talent: Recruit the sharpest blockchain engineers, AI/ML specialists, UI/UX designers, community builders, and legal/business development professionals to forge this comprehensive ecosystem.
 * Drive Global Adoption: Fund aggressive global marketing campaigns to onboard key contributors and users.
I am singularly focused on redefining how human intellect is valued in the digital age. This is not just a technological investment; it's an investment in the foundational infrastructure of the next global economy, where human genius is the ultimate, unstoppable asset.
Join me. Power the GeniusForge. Dominate the Human Intellect Exchange. Secure your founding stake in the multi-trillion-dollar future of validated human potential.
Investor & Donor Perks: Your Founding Stake in the Genius Economy

Your investment in the Intellectual Capital Protocol is more than a donation; it's a direct investment in the future of human ingenuity and a claim on the immense wealth it will generate. We've designed a tiered system of exclusive perks to reward our early supporters, ensuring you stand to gain significantly as the ICP ecosystem flourishes. These perks are not just tokens of our gratitude; they are strategic advantages in the dawning age of intellectual capital.
The Core Reward: Your ICP Token Allocation

Upon successful funding and the launch of the ICP blockchain, a pre-defined percentage of the very first ICP tokens generated will be allocated directly to our early investors and donors. These tokens represent your direct equity in the global Intellectual Capital Protocol, poised for exponential appreciation as the network expands and ICP becomes the universal currency for validated intellect.
Tier 1: The Visionary Pioneer ($100 - $999)
* ICP Token Allocation: Receive an initial allocation of ICP tokens.
* Official Digital Founder's Badge: A unique, non-transferable digital badge signifying your early support for the Intellectual Capital Protocol.
* Early Project Updates: Gain access to exclusive, in-depth reports and insights directly from the development team.
* Community Insider Access: Join a private community channel for early supporters, fostering direct engagement with the team.
Tier 2: The Architect's Circle ($1,000 - $9,999)
* Enhanced ICP Token Allocation: Receive a significantly larger allocation of ICP tokens, proportional to your investment.
* All perks from The Visionary Pioneer tier.
* Priority Beta Access to GeniusForge: Be among the very first to experience and test the GeniusForge platform, with early access to submit intellectual contributions.
Tier 3: The Intellectual Vanguard ($10,000 - $49,999)
* Substantial ICP Token Allocation: Receive a foundational allocation of ICP tokens, reflecting your significant commitment to the project.
* All perks from The Architect's Circle tier.
* Exclusive Beta Access to Human Intellect Exchange (HIX): Gain privileged early access to the HIX marketplace for intellectual capital trading.
* Direct Advisory Input: Opportunity to provide direct input on key feature developments and strategic directions for the ICP ecosystem.
* Personalized ICP Vision Briefing: A private briefing with the ICP founder to discuss the project's trajectory and strategic opportunities.
Tier 4: The Strategic Luminary ($50,000+)
* Founding Contributor Token Allocation: Receive the highest possible percentage of initial ICP tokens, securing your position as a core owner in this emerging market.
* All perks from The Intellectual Vanguard tier.
* Early Partnership Exploration Access: Direct access to the business development team for exploring potential strategic partnerships or enterprise solutions leveraging the ICP ecosystem.
* Lifetime VIP Platform Access: Permanent VIP status across all current and future ICP ecosystem platforms.
* Named Recognition (Optional): Prominent acknowledgment as a "Founding Luminary" on the ICP website and in select launch materials, if desired.

Your support is the catalyst that will transform this vision into a global economic force. By investing in the Intellectual Capital Protocol, you're not just funding a project; you're securing a privileged position at the forefront of the next great digital revolution, where human intellect is finally recognized as the ultimate, commandable asset. Join us, and claim your stake in the multi-trillion-dollar future of validated human potential.

title: BY SFD - Super Fire Detector of BY Technology
description: BY SFD - Super Fire Detector AI spots flames up to 100m-328ft away. Protecting lives and property.
allParagraphs: BY SFD - Super Fire Detector AI spots flames up to 100m-328ft away. Protecting lives and property.

Every year, fires claim thousands of lives and cause billions in property damage worldwide. The difference between safety and tragedy often comes down to just minutes—or even seconds. Traditional smoke detectors only activate after significant smoke has accumulated, precious time that could mean the difference between a minor incident and a devastating disaster.
Watch Our Prototype in Action!
We've documented extensive field testing of the BY SFD prototype using just a standard webcam connected to our software. The results are remarkable:
See our system detecting actual flames at distances up to 60 meters!
The detector detected also at 100 meters !!!  - we will upload the video soon.
The Breakthrough

After witnessing the limitations of conventional detection systems firsthand, our team of engineers and safety experts embarked on a mission to create something fundamentally different. The result is the BY Super Fire Detector (SFD)—a revolutionary system that doesn't wait for smoke to develop, but actually sees fire at its earliest stages.

Using advanced computer vision and proprietary AI algorithms, the SFD continuously analyzes visual data to identify the unique optical signatures of flames. When a potential threat is detected, our multi-layered verification system immediately confirms genuine fire events while filtering out false alarms.
Beyond Conventional Limits
The SFD goes where traditional detectors simply cannot:
Early Detection: Identifies flames before significant smoke develops
Long-Range Protection: Monitors distances up to 100+ meters
Indoor AND Outdoor: One system protects your entire property
Our system works in homes, businesses, industrial facilities, and even farms—providing comprehensive protection previously unavailable in a single solution.
Why This Matters

When a fire begins, every second counts. The BY SFD provides crucial extra minutes for evacuation and emergency response, potentially saving lives and limiting property damage. For remote properties, farms, or businesses, the ability to visually verify threats from anywhere means you can take immediate action even when you're miles away.
The Technology

The SFD combines high-definition optical sensors with sophisticated AI processing to distinguish actual flames from normal heat sources. Unlike infrared or ultraviolet detectors that trigger false alarms from sunlight or heating equipment, our system uses multiple verification points to ensure you're only alerted to genuine threats.
Installation requires no special wiring, and the weatherproof design withstands extreme temperatures. The system connects directly to your smartphone, providing real-time alerts.
Join Our Mission

We've created working prototypes and completed extensive testing. Now we need your support to bring the BY SFD to mass production. By backing this campaign, you're not just investing in your family's safety; you're helping introduce a fundamental advancement in fire protection technology.

Be among the first to secure this revolutionary safety system at exclusive early-bird pricing. Whether you're protecting your home, business, or remote property, the BY SFD offers peace of mind that conventional systems simply cannot provide.
Join us in redefining fire safety for the modern era—because when it comes to fire, detection shouldn't be the last line of defense, but the first.

title: Sulagan Food Storage Systems
description: Easy-open containers and computer vision fridge organization app.
allParagraphs: Easy-open containers and computer vision fridge organization app.
Our containers have a latching lid that opens 80% of the way, allowing for easy, one-handed eating when you don't have a table.
Traditional locking food container require space to use, and often have juices or water on the lid.
Traditional 4 tab locking containers can be tough to use.
Lid fully removes for cleaning or filling.
It's easy to eat one-handed or in tricky places.
Stay organized, write notes, messages, or information on our colorful sheets.
We offer silicone in various colors so you don't have to sacrifice your style.

Sulagan containers are suitable for the dishwasher, microwave, and freezer. The borosilicate glass body is also safe in the oven.  You can cook, cool, and reheat your food all in the same container without it losing its shape or having to transfer your food between dishes.

Recently, due its cheap cost, nearly all glass bakeware is made of soda lime glass. This glass is not as resistant to thermal shock, meaning that it can't go from extreme cold to extreme hot well. Borosilicate glass can withstand temperatures from -490 to 752 °F (-290 to 400 °C).
Sulagan containers are made of environmentally friendly Ecozen plastic (made from corn!), PP and borosilicate glass.  Ecozen is also carbon neutral to produce!
If you break a lid or container you don't have to buy a whole new container - just buy the part you need. This makes our containers a great investment in the long run.

Take a picture of your food and the Sulagan app will use computer vision technology to analyze what it is and suggest a reminder date for you.  Beta users can have a list up to 100, while premium users from our Indiegogo campaign can have unlimited lists- forever.
Always know what you have and never buy duplicates by keeping a visual representation of your fridge in your pocket.
Get reminders when you may have kept foods too long.
Not going to finish something? Give it away to friends before you have to throw it out.
As food rots in a landfill, it emits methane- a greenhouse gas 28 to 36 times more potent than the carbon that comes out of passenger vehicles.
Some of the most common reasons for wasted food in the household are:
Food spoilage
Over-preparing
Date label confusion
Overbuying
Poor Planning
Source: Foodprint.org
Rising awareness has meant that the rate of food waste has fallen. Between 2007 and 2012, household food waste was reduced by 15%.
But we can do even better!
Sulagan wants to reduce food waste even further by making sure that forgotten leftovers and un-eaten groceries are a thing of the past.
If you don't want a full Sulagan bundle or want more than the bundle- we also have a variety of add-ons that you can add to your pledge.
If we reach the following goals, we will provide these additional silicone colors for all backers!
We went through many phases of design, trying the create a balance between style and full functionality.
We are ready for production! We've worked so hard to get to this point and can't wait to send out your containers.

title: SPLACH Thunder: Silky Smooth Dual-Motor eScooter
description: Lightning Speed, Ultimate Comfort, Agile Maneuverability, Excellent Lightweight.
allParagraphs: Lightning Speed, Ultimate Comfort, Agile Maneuverability, Excellent Lightweight.

Quiet as the nightfall silently emerges yet as fast as a jaguar that blazes through--SPLACH Thunder e-scooter takes you to enjoy the silky smooth journey you've never had before. With its lightning speed, natural rubber suspension, and agile maneuverability, this scooter redefines the e-scooter experience.

Dual motors deliver a lightning speed of up to 37 mph. Equipped with natural rubber suspension, it ensures a bump-free ride, allowing you to savor the joy of scooting with comfort and stability.  Thunder's meticulously crafted structure offers crisp handling, maneuverable in all thorny road conditions. Thunder has two models, one with 9" tires and the other with 10" tires, allowing riders to choose based on personal preferences.
Race ahead with the SPLACH Thunder e-scooter like a thunderbolt and leave others far behind!
Dual motors pump out 2400W at peak to deliver a lot more punch, boosting to a top speed spectrum from 34-37mph.
The 52V 15.6ah battery propels the constant acceleration to 25 mph within 3.9 seconds.
Punchy power showcases the stunning ascending capability of a 50% incline.
A 3-in-1 suspension system comprising damping, shock absorption, and bearings contributes to a smooth ride.
Fantastic suspension strokes both at the front and rear iron out bumps and shocks, giving you perfect poise on all road conditions.
The ample power on tap translates to a maximum range of 37.5 miles on a single charge.
Wider tires bring about better gripping and traction, which is a big plus for off-road exploration.
Thunder 9: Features 9×3 inch split-type pneumatic tires for easy maintenance and hassle-free tire changes.
Thunder 10: Comes with 10×3 inch vacuum tires that provide even better shock resistance and cushioning.
The dual braking system offers unparalleled braking force that is both responsive and sufficient.
Thunder 9: Equipped with mechanical disc brakes that are less prone to premature lock-up.
Thunder 10: Features hydraulic disc brakes that offer a smoother and more consistent braking performance in higher braking force and shorter stopping distances.
The lightweight and compact design, starting at just 61 lbs, along with the foldable mechanism makes it easy to carry around.
The extra safety bolt design ensures stem solidity while riding. Folding and unfolding by hand is easy and quick, requiring no extra tools.
A simple toggle between buttons provides 12 selectable speed modes: Turbo/Eco button x Single/Dual motor x 3 gear modes on display.
The high ground clearance of at least 6 inches excels in navigating both urban streets and challenging terrains.
The dedicatedly crafted structure creates agile maneuverability, allowing riders to get spry handling out of it.

The expertly configured battery compartment is equipped with an aerosol fire extinguisher, protecting the scooter from catching fire due to shortcut, overcharge, overheating, or overcurrent owing to its heat absorption and cooling effect, giving riders peace of mind when using and not using the scooter.
Flattened design with sturdily-built construction facilitates a reliable ride zipping through in style.
The color of the LED ambient side lights is changeable via the App on the smartphone to create your own vibe and shine through like fast-moving neon lights.
Noticeable well-rounded lighting of the headlight & taillights, plus front and rear turn signals ensure the security day and night.
The keyless system allows you to unlock the Thunder with a swipe of the NFC card.

Mileage and each move are well recorded by the smart display. Once connected to the phone via Bluetooth, the info will be simultaneously uploaded to the App and can be shared with friends from the cloud.  ODO Ranking competition from this App generates not just fun but the opportunity to contribute to preventing global warming.  The more you ride, the less carbon footprint you create.

SPLACH gives substantial encouragement to those who join this movement by offering a half-price coupon for buying all sorts of accessories based on your mileage points per quarter.  A pic shared with us will be given 10 points.  The more you ride, the more you’ll get and the more you contribute to greening.
Apple Airtag compartment is available to have your Thunder trackable with the Airtag without theft anxiety.
Thunder is lightweight but amazingly capable of supporting riders weighing up to 330 lbs, meeting the demands of most riders.
The IP54 rating shields the scooter from water splashes and dust ingress from any direction.
A push of a button activates the horn to send alarming signals to people and vehicles around.
4’’ color LCD fuses aesthetics and practicality based on the integrated mobile App.
Easier plugging and unplugging of the motor connector makes motor maintenance and change hands down.
Superior cruise control activates after 8 seconds of maintaining a constant speed, allowing you to take your hand off the accelerator while maintaining a set speed.

It’s armed with 10’’ tires at the price of an 8’’ model, pairing stunning off-road capability with on-road refinement. Competent and agile as a jaguar to flash by on all terrains; lightweight and portable to let you cruise around in city jungles.
Nothing compares to Thunder, which offers pure enjoyment of urban living and bold adventures.

Agility, speed, and power are what we picture our SPLACH Thunder is supposed to be.  During the crafting process, multiple layers of physical and virtual integration with upgrades are added to it.  Lightweight, solidity, and intuitiveness are the key elements taken into consideration when building this smart machine. Many parts combine the all-in-one design to optimize the weight overall and decrease the risk of jointing parts that may bring; the increase of the proportion of steel in materials is to strengthen toughness as well as to enhance load-bearing capacity.  The outlook of the scooter is out of an intuitive design to emit natural visuals that are coordinated and consolidated.  In addition, the more intelligent maneuvering contributes to a travel that’s even more convenient and enjoyable.
Hard to imagine what SPLACH Thunder is like? You absolutely deserve one to experience for yourself!
Notebookcheck: Powerful e-scooter SPLACH Thunder with two motors and full suspension starts at a special price
tuningblog.eu: 2024 Splach Thunder: Crazy e-scooter for adrenaline junkies

Not only are we making a brand of electric vehicles, but we’re also building a big family to have members join in to create a rider-friendly environment to expand the use of green gadgets made by SPLACH and have fun together.
Our family members are happy riders who ride SPLACH for commute and leisure, exploring the world in all kinds of adventures without limit. Tangible testimony is these happy & content smiles!

SPLACH has been a remarkable creator of stylish, practical, and eco-friendly vehicles which are ideal substitutes to cars and other means of transport.
SPLACH was established in Los Angeles and Taiwan by passionate entrepreneurs. Dennis, the CEO of SPLACH, is committed to designing products that fulfill customers' needs. Graduated from USC, he's well familiar with the US market. Born in Taiwan, he precisely maneuvers state-of-the-art technology in producing high-end e-scooters. With his and the whole team's great ambition and devotion, more advanced items are still to come!
