title: laagam - The Only Fashion Bag You Need
description: 4-in-1 bag that fits any situation | Multi-position | High-tech | Vegan Leather | Made in Spain
allParagraphs: 4-in-1 bag that fits any situation | Multi-position | High-tech | Vegan Leather | Made in Spain
We are laagam, an affordable luxury fashion brand based in Barcelona inspiring girls to take the world by storm ⚡️.
How? By crafting unique pieces. Our latest creation is the 4-in-1 fashion bag: a multi-position, high-tech, vegan bag for any occasion.
The bag you deserve, the only bag you need!
We are girls, we know how it feels to have a closet full of bags but still don't know which one to pick.
So we asked ourselves: how come there is no bag to cover all our needs? Even more, why the most practical ones are never fashionable and unique?
Thanks to your help, we finally have the answer to our needs:
Think about this bag (with details in golden or silvery, you choose!) as the perfect complement for any occasion:
1) You can wear it as a purse hanging from your shoulder for your daily routine.
2) As a handbag from its rings for a more formal and sophisticated touch.
3) Attached to your waist as a belt bag for those busy days you need to be hands-free.
4) Or just take with you the wallet to that special date when you only need your essentials.
Chipolo is a bluetooth device with a FREE dedicated app connecting your laagam bag to your smartphone. You will always know where your bag is.
No more worries while carrying your bag!

Our integrated power bank provides convenient energy to keep your electronic devices (smartphone, tablets, ebooks, GPS, etc.)  always charged. It comes with a cable adapter for Apple and Android devices.

This external battery is ultra-compact (width: 0.5 inches/1.3 cm), has high-speed charging technology (recharge your phone in minutes) and comes with 10000m Ah of energy (enough to charge an iPhone 4 times).
The Chipolo device and a the power bank are included with the purchase of our bag for free. They have specific compartments designed to fit perfectly inside.
Our bag has 5 different large capacity compartments to carry all your belongings. All of them are smartly designed to cover your needs:

Our patented design has been engineered by MOVEX, a leading studio specialized in applying the latests product innovations to the traditional manufacturing of leather goods. Their clients include world-renowned fashion designers.
The final design integrates the 4 different positions in the same bag and all as the tech accessories (Chipolo device + power bank) in their own compartments.
Ubrique is a small town located in the south of Spain (Andalusia). Located within a difficult access valley of the Sierra de Cádiz, Ubrique is recognized by its picturesque white colored houses...
...but better known as the leather goods capital of Europe. The quality of Ubrique’s artisans is recognized worldwide and the tradition dates back to the Middle Ages.
Ubrique is the supplier to luxury International fashion houses such as Loewe, Gucci and Louis Vuitton.
Our 4-in-1 bag is handmade on those same workshops through a meticulous process, taking care of every single detail:
But what’s exactly and how is vegan leather made? (Don’t get fooled by plastic fake leather!)
Easily explained, vegan leather is an activist's & eco-friendly alternative to leather from animals.
Take a look on how we’ve processed it, from the grape skin to your hands:
laagam bag details (rings, logo and fastener) are provided by the famous YKK Japanese zipper brand: they make roughly half of all the zippers on earth!
All the bag details can be either silvery or golden, you choose!
The 3-in-1 bag cover easily converts from a protector to a tote bag, a backpack and even a purse.
Made of beige cotton, it has adjustable vegan leather handles. You can modify the position of the cover with the stabilizer straps that come in the same color as your bag (silvery or golden).
At laagam we inspire girls to ‘take the world by storm’ ⚡️ . We do so by designing affordable luxury fashion with a time to market approach.
We are based in sunny Barcelona, where we design all our pieces then handmade in Spain.
We’re a young team of female entrepreneurs trying to redefine the apparel industry from our generation’s point of view. We transform our empowering lifestyle and values into fashion piece.

We expand the Loopit range with a new product inspired by our first Loop ever. We have removed the ring to create a perfectly circular loop and made it 25% longer. This new design allows it to stretch 45% more to be used conveniently as packing straps or backpack strap holder.
Upgrade your backpack in seconds with Loopit and carry your belongings smarter. We have created it to make your life easier anywhere you go.
Free your hands instantly and store a variety of objects on your backpack straps. It's very useful for drinks for example or gloves during the winter.
Carry your essentials outside of your backpack and always have them at hands reach. You can also use your loops as packing straps or as a light anti-theft device.
In one second you now have access to your shades, your tripod or even your small folding drone to capture your next shot with any backpack.
Whether you are roaming around NYC, walking on the sand in Malaysia or hiking in Canada, your Loops are there and ready to free your hands.

Looking for something inside of your backpack and ending up with a mess won't happen to you again. Loop your belongings and keep it tidy all the time. It also helps you save space by keeping your bulky items compressed.
Don't worry about losing your jacket again. You can either Loop it to the strap as shown below or roll it and Loop it to the handle of your backpack.
The silicone stripe prevents your belongings from sliding away so they are always safely attached when they are looped.

The strap is adjustable in length to be usable with most backpacks straps and to accommodate a wide variety of objects. Made of acetal, the buckle is ultra slim yet sturdy so you can always rely on Loopit.
Stealth theft is a very widespread issue and your bag is a target of choice for thieves. A second of inattention can result in thousands of euros of losses.
Your multipurpose Loops offer a certain level of protection to keep your bags safe especially when you are carrying expensive equipment like a laptop or a camera.
Be one step ahead and carry your slim wallet or keys on your belt to protect them from theft or loss in crowded places. You can also use it as a badge holder.
Using a luggage bag holder makes it easier for you to carry it around but also helps to avoid having it snatched.
You will receive your Loops in a resealable pouch so you can store them including when you are traveling.

title: 4K HDR Professional Drone with Hasselblad Camera
description: Embark on an unparalleled aerial photography journey with our 4K HDR Professional Drone,.
allParagraphs: Embark on an unparalleled aerial photography journey with our 4K HDR Professional Drone,.
Help Us Take Flight – Support Our 4K HDR Professional Drone Project!
We're launching a campaign to fund a cutting-edge 4K HDR Professional Drone with a Hasselblad camera and extended flight time – and we need your help to make it soar.
Whether you're passionate about stunning aerial cinematography, environmental storytelling, indie filmmaking, or powerful visual journalism, this drone isn't just a tool—it's a vehicle for vision.
Why This Project Matters
A New Perspective for a Changing World

The world is full of stories waiting to be told from the skies. From environmental conservation efforts to community documentaries and creative film projects, this drone will be used to capture high-resolution, cinematic footage that can inspire change, document truth, and elevate voices.

With a Hasselblad camera, known for its unparalleled image quality, and extended flight capabilities, we’ll be able to shoot professional-level footage that was previously out of reach—especially in remote or hard-to-access areas.
Your support enables the creation of:
Short films and documentaries with global and local impact
Aerial views for humanitarian causes, wildlife protection, and cultural preservation
Educational content that sparks curiosity and awareness
Behind-the-scenes access to beautiful, untouched parts of our planet
✅ A Track Record You Can Trust
This isn't our first flight.

We’ve successfully completed multiple creative media projects, from grassroots documentaries to collaborations with NGOs and independent artists. With each project, we've delivered quality content, remained budget-conscious, and stuck to our timelines.
This drone will level up our production and open creative doors like never before—and you can be part of it.
Risks & Challenges
Every great journey has turbulence. Here’s what we’re mindful of:
⚠️ The Challenges:
Hardware Delays or Shortages – Supply chain issues could delay delivery.
Learning Curve – High-end drones require training to operate at their full potential.
Weather & Travel Risks – Aerial shooting is weather-dependent, and location work can be logistically complex.
Our Solutions:
We’ve already researched multiple vendors and have a preferred supplier with a proven record of on-time delivery.
Our team includes certified drone pilots with experience in flying both prosumer and enterprise drones.
We’ve built contingency days into our production schedule to allow flexibility for weather and travel.
We're transparent about these risks—and we have the skills and strategy to navigate them.
How You Can Help (Even If You Can’t Donate)
We understand not everyone can contribute financially—but that doesn’t mean you can’t support us!
Here’s how you can help:
Share our campaign on social media, email, or in your community.
Use Indiegogo’s share tools to help spread the word.
Tag friends who love drones, filmmaking, nature, or innovation.
Join the conversation and stay connected as we hit our milestones.
Every share, like, and comment helps push this project forward.
Let’s Create Something Beautiful—Together

Your contribution is more than just a donation—it's a partnership in creativity, innovation, and impact. With your support, we can create breathtaking visuals, tell powerful stories, and inspire a global audience—one flight at a time.
Let’s make this vision a reality.
Ready to take off? Join us.
Would you like me to help turn this into a full Indiegogo campaign page with headers, perks, timeline, and budget sections?

title: Beauty For Everyone
description: Discreet and cozy beauty treatment room for people with special needs and disorders.
allParagraphs: Discreet and cozy beauty treatment room for people with special needs and disorders.

Hello! I am Berit from Estonia. Working as a registered nurse on a daily basis. Currently working as a family nurse and also doing emergency appointments at my family medical centre. My previous work experience also includes surgery, as an operating room nurse, and the field of mental health, also as a nurse there. I am also very-very interested in the field of beauty, skin treatment and body care. 
I am a Libra, so I am an extreme beauty and harmony seeker and perfectionist.

So, about my project/vision - this idea came to my mind because of my work - I come across many people with special needs and also just simply sensitive people who need a different approach during various medical procedures and treatments. In addition, I have a son with autistic spectrum disorder, who has taught me a lot how to communicate and reach to my special clients/patients.

People with special needs are often afraid and fearful of turning to medical professionals or going to various procedures also gaining their trust takes time and sometimes quite a lot! Unfortunately, many medical professionals are short on time or do not have the willingness to deal with sensitive and time-consuming patients/clients. But even such clients want to be beautiful, look their best and be confident, despite their fears.
It is my little dream to create a space/salon where my client can feel special, comfortable, respected while receiving professional advise and treatment, considering the specifics of my client
To make my dream come true, I would definitely need your support the most:

Planning to start it slowly and calmly, to collect customers, create a trusting relationship with them and  hopefully develop into something bigger, collaborate with another nurses (already have some of them in my mind who could handle this, are open-minded and kind-hearted) and also a doctor who co-work with.
To begin with, I need to rent a room where to start creating my little cozy dream salon (at the beginning I'll probably look for a room where most of the furnishings are already there).

- Some medical equipment and devices to get started, especially a IPL laser to treat rashes, surgical and acne scarring, acne itself (not active and inflammatory), uneven skin tone and structure, pigmentation, also stretch-marks, which many overweight clients usually have, especially autistic people. Offer my clients regular skin inspections, assist them with hygiene tips, routine-based skin care and what products to use daily, taking into account their wishes and specific needs such as sensitivity to smells and allergies.

- Also would like to have electrostimulation machine for clients who need for rehabilitation, to stimulate muscles and nerves and relieve pain, especially for clients with limited mobility to prevent muscle atrophy. For clients with chronic/acute pain or recovering from surgery. Reduce swelling and also for some clients for urinary incontinence treatment.

*Comfortable bed for procedures requiring a lying position and comfortable chair for procedures requiring a sitting position are hopefully included in room already, if not then I hope to reach a goal as much to involve those too.
That would be all I would need to start with. Sure I'm dreaming of a few more items, especially devices, but I hope I'll be lucky enough to be able to buy some myself.
If I won't reach the entire goal I am dreaming here, I will use the money to save up for the laser. It is my dream!

I believe and truly hope in my heart that my initiative will encourage medical professionals and cosmetologists to work more with people with special needs. They are often feared, thought to be unpredictable, aggressive, and difficult clients. I want to prove that they are also just people who want care, help, advice, be confident and to look good as we all want - both, men and women!.
And of course you can feel in your heart that you have done a good deed for those weaker than you!

The risk is definitely that I won't get enough clients, I have some patients from the hospital and clinic who trust me and are used to me, but it usually takes time to gain the trust of people with special needs. Hopefully I'll get enough advertising from existing patients and their loved ones. Also need to let my colleagues to advertise myself in hospital to reach to more clients.
I've also thought about the fact that in the beginning I'll probably have to serve regular clients too, to get enough income and not fail.

You can always share my idea with your friends, maybe they think it is awesome and want to help me a bit. Or advertise my dream to some medical device company if you have some good acquaintances somewhere. Or you have other awesome ideas I don’t have in mind now, always accepting all the help!

title: STUND - The watch that makes you FEEL time
description: STUND does not tell time. It's a mindfulness timepiece that moves you closer to the present moment
allParagraphs: STUND does not tell time. It's a mindfulness timepiece that moves you closer to the present moment
Time flows in a constant rhythm. But we perceive the length of each beat subjectively.
STUND is Danish by heart. All STUND timepieces are assembled by hand in Copenhagen, Denmark.
41mm in diameter. Only 7 mm tall. Weighing just around 50 grams with genuine leather strap. We wanted STUND to feel light on your wrist and sturdy as a quality timepiece.

STUND's chassis is machined from one solid block of high-grade Stainless steel 316, cut with high geometric tolerances to give you the perfect weight-ratio to wear around your wrist – it’s not too light nor too heavy, it’s perfect.
Additionally, we machine from one block to lead and amplify the vibrations through the chassis and into your wrist.

All components are polished by hand to provide a mirror-like reflection. Our high-grade Stainless steel is corrosion resistant and has a protective coating which prevents scratching. You can carefree wear STUND throughout your day.

Researchers have proven that practising present-moment awareness through mindfulness positively affects the ACC (anterior cingulate cortex in the brain, which is associated with self-regulation) and the hippocampus responsible for emotion and memory. Further practising slowing down through mindfulness and present-moment awareness will affect brain areas related to perception, body awareness, pain tolerance, emotion regulation, introspection, complex thinking, and sense of self.

".. Recent research provides strong evidence that practising non-judgmental, present-moment awareness (a.k.a. mindfulness) changes the brain, and it does so in ways that anyone working in today’s complex business environment, and certainly every leader, should know about."

Research conducted at Pepperdine University examined over 4,000 scientific papers about mindfulness and its effect on the workspace, and it suggests that present-moment awareness through mindfulness positively impacts human functioning, helps improve the quality of attention, impacts internal quality and the interpersonal behaviour and improves a greater empathy and compassion for others.

title: DayDisc: the high-concept, low-tech tool for life.
description: A revolutionary self care device, giving you back power over your time.
allParagraphs: A revolutionary self care device, giving you back power over your time.
How? Well, it's what you get when you cross an antique Yugoslavian clockmaker’s tool, the irresistible attraction of magnetism and a holistic worldview.
They promised us The Cloud, and we got fog. Quantify yourselves, they said, then they sold our data. Instead of progress, we got crapification. Instead of liberation, we got surveillance.
Our devices used to be clever, not 'smart', and our tools used to be physical objects, not applications. And things were made to last. Were we more human then?
Do you ever feel overwhelmed by the inescapability of the digital world? Or stupefied by a constant barrage of (mostly useless) information?
If too much modern tech is messing with your mind and bothering your balance, we developed DayDisc for you.
We have ventured into forgotten realms of the past on an archaeological and philosophical journey. We wanted to rediscover how our ancestors were so capable before screens, wifi, and AI.
And we've brought something useful back to the future:
DayDisc is the fruit of our labour - a necklace that’s also a new kind of activity tracker.
It’s radically simple, and amazingly effective. It tracks only what really matters to you, using simple and timeless analogue technology.
Hidden magnets firmly hold the tracking orbs which you manually move around the disc to keep track of your completed activities.
The DayDisc Challenge is simple, achievable and rewarding: just take 12 opportunities to work toward your goals, every day.
By counting only what truly counts, it keeps you focused and clearly shows your investment in yourself, rapidly helping you form the habits that boost your wellbeing.
Don’t take our word for it. We’ve shared DayDiscs with a small group of trailblazers, scattered around the planet, and they've shared their experiences:
It's time for the analogue tech revival! DayDisc is already changing lives, and it changed ours, and we're pretty sure it can change yours too.
So, if being an early-adopter in a grassroots global eco-wellness movement sounds exciting, please consider making a pledge to our campaign now.
What makes personal development so challenging?
The concept of self improvement is pretty straightforward. You already know the key steps to  successful change. Intent. Focus. Consistency. All that jazz.
And in recent years, technology companies have developed all kinds of complicated gadgets - the 'Wearables', that were supposed to make it all easier.
Only, they don’t. Why?

The trouble is that, far from aiding focus, these devices are specifically designed to distract. By manipulating the reward centres of our brain, they develop a stranglehold on your attention span. This creates a vicious cycle that makes it harder than ever to reach your goals.
And by forcing us to adapt to how they work, they erode our autonomy and ingenuity.
Besides, giving a third party access to your most personal information in this way is a pretty big deal. Can you trust its accuracy? And can you trust the company not to sell it, or get hacked?
Smart devices don’t last that long either. They’re part of a cycle of planned obsolescence, designed to be made redundant by a slicker, ‘smarter’ version after a year or two.
After immersing ourselves in online reviews, it became clear that many users of digital activity trackers or ‘wearables’ have unsatisfying experiences with them.
Surely there’s got to be a better way?
Of course there is! That’s why we’ve developed DayDisc.
A special kind of tracker that focuses on what attracts you, not what distracts you.

Using just the fundamental forces of magnetism and willpower, DayDisc converts your best intentions into impressive outcomes. Engage in a personal daily ritual with your DayDisc, and you’ll quickly develop the productive habits that you set your mind to. Designate specific, significant activities that will upgrade your lifestyle, as you might with a coach, and use your DayDisc to count and track them.
No software - you are the operating system. No battery - you are the power source.

DayDisc is a striking, gender-fluid talisman specially engineered for self-development. Intuitive and reliable, it uses principles of design and of psychology to build up the positive feedback loops that lead to lasting change. By making it easy to begin and sustain new and improved patterns of behaviour, DayDisc ensures you invest time in yourself.

Daydisc is grounded and ergonomic, positive not pushy. It motivates you to achieve your own personal daily revolution, with the action of moving the tracking orb around the dial with a magnetic 'click' giving you discreet multi-sensorial feedback on your progress.
Every morning, set your intention to complete 12 repetitions of an action in one day. And DayDisc will keep you on track.
*there are no prescribed uses of DayDisc. The list of possible uses is only limited by the imagination. We look forward to hearing about the way people will use theirs.
How you use your time determines almost everything about you: your personality, the state of your health, your beliefs and opinions, skills and talents – you name it.
We are always becoming what we can be. This means change is inevitable, let's make it for the better...
So get started with DayDisc, and take charge of your change today.

Studies have shown that approximately 80% of New Year’s resolutions fail! So clearly, we need better ways to stay motivated - new approaches are needed for your journey towards achieving long-term goals and resolutions.
First, it’s important to think a bit more carefully about your goal. To give yourself the best chance of success, goals should be:

Simple but significant
Trackable so you can monitor your progress
Realistic and relevant
Timebound so you can get regular

But getting feedback on your performance and progress is important too, as part of breaking your goals down into achievable chunks. There are loads of great books available on habit formation, but it always boils down to the habit loop:
DayDisc is designed to help you close the loop and thrive.

There are loads of different ways you can use the magnetic tracking orbs that come with each DayDisc, but these three patterns have worked particularly well for us and our founding community of users:
The Focus Orb:

Use your favourite colour Orb to track the transformation of a single intention into a single habit. Pick one thing you want to do more often. Aim to complete 12 repetitions of that particular activity each day. Each time you manage it, move your orb to the next slot on your DayDisc.
Congratulations! That’s one orbit. A simple, clear, effective way to begin and sustain positive change.
Mind, Body, and Spirit Orbs:

Choose three Orbs and assign them to different types of activities. For example, you could use one for something Mind related, one that’s Body focused, and another that’s Spirit centric. Use the orbs to track your activities in all three domains simultaneously.
This pattern is quite a challenge, but very rewarding. DayDisc’s orbs can stack in the same slot, so don’t worry if your goals overlap – this can create some pretty cool shapes and dynamics!
Reminder Orb:
Pick an Orb to live on your fridge, or desk lamp, or somewhere handy and visible. It will remind you of your daily goal whenever you see it.
Bonus: you can also use it to remind yourself of meetings, appointments, or deadlines, by pre-positioning in the appropriate groove, eg. 4pm = groove 4. (Use this in conjunction with another pattern)
We’re also looking forward to hearing about patterns we haven’t discovered yet, so please experiment, have fun and let us know what you come up with in the comments!
Timeless construction. Timely functionality.

We designed DayDisc to pay homage to the eternal values of beauty and usefulness. It represents the Sun, and abides by principles of Sacred Geometry. DayDisc’s proportions are determined by the Golden Ratio.
The radial design is due to DayDisc’s original archetype as a watchmaker’s tool. But rather than making clocks, this is a tool that creates time.

The partitioning of the circle into twelve is an ancient method of segmenting time. Look at the Zodiac for example. Babylonian philosopher-priests used a base-12 counting system for a practical reason: it offers more whole fractions, making it easier to divide and subdivide.

This means that, with DayDisc’s twelve grooves, you can easily break down your progress throughout the day into sets and subsets. The circuit can be split into ½, ⅓, ¼, ⅙, giving you an easy, versatile way to plan and track your activities.

With DayDisc, your information isn’t uploaded anywhere. It stays where it’s needed most: with you. This makes it intrinsically stable, reliable, and sustainable. And with multiple orbs to play with, it’s also pretty versatile.
Each DayDisc comes with a commitment card.

DayDisc is based on the polar opposite of planned obsolescence – something we like to call planned permanescence. Like the pyramids, or Stonehenge, or buried treasure. Planned permanescence makes for maximally sustainable objects.
“It has to work forever.”

That was a key underlying principle in DayDisc’s development. You pledge once for DayDisc, and it lasts forever, delivering a lifetime of value and more. It doesn’t get much more sustainable than that.
DayDiscs are guaranteed for the lifetime of your bloodline. Pretty much the only way to invalidate the warranty is to cast it into the fires of Mount Doom.
We would be honoured if you took your DayDisc to your grave, or considered it an heirloom object to be kept in the family.
Just a quick occasional polish will always restore its full shine.
Wellness is huge now, and a growing market with lots of serious research in the field of behavioural studies and psychology to explain what makes us tick, and keeps us ticking healthily.
We have gone deep into the literature during the design of DayDisc to make sure it follows proven psychological formats that will help you to improve your daily life and overall wellbeing.
DayDisc’s Western influences include the science of behaviour modification, Skinner operant conditioning, Cognitive Behavioural Theory, and many coaching schemes.
But many of us in the West are missing out on the benefits of a holistic worldview that understands the universe and ourselves as manifestations of a single subtle energetic being.
A lot of healing and harmony can be found in becoming sensitive to our true nature. And the technological obsession of western culture often distances us from the simplicity of this truth.

DayDisc signifies a return to respect for the intrinsic properties of things. Circles are cyclic. Magnets are magnetic. Metals are strong. And we are active beings. These elements combine to create a vortex in the Aether which will empower your life.
To find that missing piece, we looked back, and to the East.
“F***ing magnets, how do they work?”
Miracles - Insane Clown Posse
Who doesn't love magnets? A mysterious attractive force... And super useful, right?
From the first compass 3000 years ago in China to the Large Hadron Collider, people love putting magnets to ingenious uses. But we had to check they were safe!

Magnets are considered safe by the US National Center of Complementary and Alternative Medicine (NCCAM), and magnetic therapy devices are actually in rising demand due to the impressive results and benefits users have obtained.

Neodymium magnets like ours have been shown to increase microcirculation, and are increasingly being used to treat chronic pain syndrome, arthritis, wound healing, insomnia, headaches, and several other illnesses.

The torus is the fundamental form of balanced energy flow. Energy passes through one vortex, along  the axis, out the other vortex, wraps back around and renews. It's the shape of some of nature’s most powerful phenomena: tornados, whirlpools, black holes, and energy fields around planets and the sun. But it’s also found around living organisms.

This is what Shamanic Practices & Energy Medicine refer to as the Aura, Luminous Energy Field, “Light Body,” or Biofield in the scientific community. It radiates out in a toroidal shape, and through its interaction with the environment we can become depleted or recharged. We can be in flow or stuck, open or shutdown, healthy or sick.
The basic idea of DayDisc is to promote energy flow, so it's fitting that it should have its own toroidal magnetic field.
Just like with your goals, DayDisc is a reflection of your personal style. There are thousands of combinations, so pick your favourites to build something unique.
> Select the metal that suits you, from luminous Brass or bright Steel

> Choose one or more of our carefully curated luxurious necklace options, from Sterling     silver (bright or dark), and 14kt gold-filled chains, to Desserto, an award-winning     vegan leather made from cactus (and hand-rolled Ahimsa silk as a stretch goal)
> Choose any extra Orbs from gold, silver, nickel, gunmetal.
If you’re ready to take that next step and join our ever-expanding DayDisc circle, come on in! DayDiscs make great gifts, so consider treating a loved one...

The significance of CRI 98Ra sunlight spectrum lighting lies in its ability to faithfully reproduce colors in their truest form. CRI, or Color Rendering Index, quantifies a light source's capacity to reveal the accurate color of objects compared to natural sunlight. In this case, CRI 98Ra signifies that the BLINDER excels in recreating the sunlight spectrum, ensuring that every color, hue, and detail in your workspace appears just as it would under natural light. title: GravaStar Sirius Earbuds: Strong bass. Low latency
description: Sci-Fi Design | Knowles Balanced Armatures | 65ms Latency for Hardcore Gamer | 16H Battery Life
allParagraphs: Sci-Fi Design | Knowles Balanced Armatures | 65ms Latency for Hardcore Gamer | 16H Battery Life

The year is 2088. The last of Earth’s green spaces have been destroyed to make way for sprawling concrete megacities. Corporations have taken all power from the people to fuel their monstrous profits. The people of Earth have all but lost hope, with many moving to live underground. As hope disappears, their once vibrant emotions have also begun to fade.

But hope can come from unexpected places. Far away, on the planet GravaStar, courage is alive. Mars and Venus, both GravaStar Bluetooth speakers, have fought many battles, with the sole mission being to protect the universe and keep that music alive at all costs.

But this mission requires a special hero. Born to revive Earth’s people, a warrior known as Tifa will travel across the galaxy with the Sirius Pro Bluetooth Earbuds, on a mission to return sound and emotion to the people of earth. Bringing back the music that will inspire new life and rejuvenate humanity with the sense of adventure that was taken from them.

Prepare your ears for the next frontier of sound. Cyberpunk design meets meteoric sound in the GravaStar Sirius Pro Earbuds – a sci-fi inspired earbud designed to take your gaming and audio experiences to new horizons.
Check out the unboxing review videos from the YouTubers! Stay tuned for more videos coming.

The GravaStar Sirius Pro’s charging case features a rugged extra-terrestrial design unlike any other Bluetooth earbuds on the market, with a bottle open design built right into the case. Because you never know when you’ll need to crack a cold one.
So the next time someone asks you to borrow an earbud, don’t just share your music. Share a memory.

The launch tower style charging case is made from a zinc alloy material that makes it resistant to scratches and durable enough to take anywhere. Featuring a mechanical button and laser engraved touch panel that gives it a weathered deep space feel.

Powerful 7.2mm Dynamic Drivers inside the Sirius Pro deliver bass you can feel in your bones. Meanwhile, four balanced armature driver units designed by the audio experts at Knowles perform like an orchestra, with each driver masterfully playing its part to produce a well-rounded audio experience that delivers on all levels – low, high, and everything in between.
Gaming Mode - Pinpoint the direction of your enemy’s footsteps with 5.1 virtual surround sound. Get deeper into your gaming.
Movie Mode - Turn anywhere you watch movies into a cinematic experience. With HD surround sound that comes from all directions for even deeper immersion.
Music Mode - Front-row seats to concert quality sound. For clear and natural vocals, deep bass delivery, and concert hall acoustics. Just like the artist intended.
Environmental noise cancellation cuts out unwanted background noise while strengthening sounds from human voices. So you get crystal clear calls every time.

Experience audio that moves as fast as you do - even while gaming in 4K. Bluetooth 5.2 on the Sirius Pro’s has a 65 millisecond response time, so you can forget about lagging audio slowing you down. That means lightspeed gameplay and smoother communication with your team when you need it most.
Pair your Android and iOS devices with the Sirius Pro’s fast with Bluetooth 5.2. Fully compatible with your favorite gaming consoles like XBox, PS5, and Nintendo Switch after purchasing an adapter.
With in-ear detection, the Sirius Pro’s will power on the instant they’re placed in your ears. And they’ll pause your music the second you take them out.

Built for long rides, long trips, or long nights at your computer, the Sirius Pro’s have enough rocket fuel to power your audio for 16 hours. That’s 4 hours of continuous playtime in the buds, and 3 extra charges in the case. So go a level further, play another symphony. You’ve got time to kill.

Find your fit with 3 sizes (S, M, L) of soft silicone tips that form effortlessly to your ear while blocking out unwanted noise. The tips are designed to conform to your ear shape for an unshakable fit. And at only 6g per earbud, they’re so light you’ll forget they’re even there.
Rated with an IPX5 waterproof rating, the Sirius Pro’s are even built to resist sweat and water, so you can go worry free into the unknown.

Change songs, adjust volume, and take calls from mission control (aka your co-workers) - all without ever touching your phone. The Sirius’s smart control means you can handle everything with a single tap. That’s one tap to answer a call from work, and another tap to dive right back into that drum solo.

The premium version (GravaStar Sirius Pro) features additional functions including bottle opener design, in-ear detection and balanced armatures for superior immersive sound quality. While the standard version (GravaStar Sirius) features the rest of the function. And the war-damaged color is only available for the GravaStar Sirius Pro.
Each cyberpunk inspired charging case is equipped with six RGB LED lights so you can personalize your case to match your style.

GravaStar Sirius Pro War-damaged Earbuds, 2021 New Launch. A new warrior born to awaken people's emotion with its strong bass and low latency. This arduous journey caused the many scars found on Tifa and the War-damaged earbuds, but each scar is not to be viewed as the witness of war, and instead, as the merits of honor. The witness of war, the merits of honor.

Better audio just landed in your living room. Mars Pro is GravaStar's 2021 new gen of Bluetooth speaker, designed to disrupt the speaker world, with upgraded dual speakers, high-fidelity HD audio and full-range subwoofers in a cyberpunk design.

The upgraded full-range subwoofers in the Mars Pro deliver powerful bass even at low volumes, so you feel your music as much as you hear it. Meanwhile, clever acoustics and DSP sound algorithms give you big sound in a small space across all genres, from crisper highs to deeper lows. With 2.5 inch full-range speakers, you can feel your music no matter the genre.

description: Tiny bags that easily fit in your pocket and are made to be brought everywhere.
allParagraphs: Tiny bags that easily fit in your pocket and are made to be brought everywhere.
After 7 successful Kickstarter campaigns and 48k+ pledges fulfilled to backers all over the world we are excited to share our latest project with you:

Ultra-light, ultra-strong, ultra-foldable. You won't believe how small these premium shopping bags pack. These tiny shopping bags are convenient to keep in your pocket at all times, are super comfortable to hold, and easily carry 66lbs (30kg).

We consume somewhere between 500 billion to 1 trillion plastic bags per year, and it’s totally unnecessary. Reusable bags are great for the environment, but most are bulky or poor quality. Nanobag 4.0 is a premium shopping bag so compact that you won’t even know you’re carrying it. The compact super-soft fabric easily folds into your pocket, and does away with impractical reusable shopping bags.
If you want to make our project an even greater success, please share our campaign with your friends on Facebook. We will be eternally grateful!

We're 100% committed to making a climate positive product. That means that we give more back to the planet than we take. We already consider our bags environmentally conscious, as they contain less materials than other bags in their category and offset single use plastic bags. In addition, for each bag sold we’ll plant one mangrove tree with Eden Reforestation. Mangrove trees happen to be one of the most effective tools against climate change, and can store up to ten times more carbon than land based tree species. One single mangrove tree can store around 1750lbs (800kg) in its 40 year lifespan. As an added bonus they prevent soil erosion and help sustain coastal ecosystems.

We're committed to creating high-quality products. The bags are made with premium custom made nylon polymer fabric and we've put in place a thorough quality-control and testing process to make sure you receive a great final product. We guarantee that your bags will be of excellent quality.

title: Cubiio 2: Autofocus Laser Cutter & Metal Engraver
description: Compact and Versatile. Make Your Creativity a Reality.
allParagraphs: Compact and Versatile. Make Your Creativity a Reality.

In 2017, our first project, the Cubiio that started it all, was the most funded fabrication tool ever on Kickstarter. Now we’re back with the 2nd generation - more powerful, much faster, yet still sporting a refined look with a compact footprint. At 2.5" slim, with a diagonal of 25" and a weight of 13 lbs, the Cubiio 2 features a workspace bigger than a standard Letter or A4 size paper, offering you plenty of room to flex your creative muscle.

Thanks to the latest advances in semiconductor laser technology, our laser cartridge works on stainless steel directly, without pre-coating spray. Cubiio 2 can engrave on titanium, dark glass, shale, brick, concrete, most varieties of colored anodized aluminum, and other materials. It even works on curved surfaces, like wine bottles.

Cubiio 2 can cut through paper, wood, leather, fabric, felt, cardboard, non-transparent acrylic, and many other materials. If the work material is too thick for a single pass to cut through, Cubiio 2 will continue to focus downward into the material for subsequent passes. The maximum cutting thickness is 5 mm.

Cubiio 2 outputs at a resolution of 500 DPI or 0.05 mm. That’s even thinner than your hair! In contrast to PWM control, our “realtime analog control” of laser power produces a wide range of gray tones. With Cubiio 2, your laser portrait is not only black and white.

Put an object in the machine and take a top view picture with the Cubiio App. Don’t worry about getting it perfect because the App will compensate for the angle deviation. Scale, rotate, position your art work, and go. What you see is what you get!

Cubiio 2 is easy to use thanks to features like autofocus, preview, Wi-Fi remote control, OTA firmware update, cross-format compatibility, alignment-free optics, and embedded fume filter. Our App is user-friendly and intuitive. It is developed by programmers led by Mr. Michael Pan, an Apple Certified Trainer.

Hundreds of amazing projects are ready to use in the cloud database (Cubiio Club). Browse, download one, and laser it immediately. Even a beginner can achieve amazing results. Cubiio Team has hired professional designers to enrich the database regularly. Users are also welcome to upload and share their projects with the community.

Our Cubiio fanpage has over 23k followers. More than 5k Cubiio owners have joined the “Quser group”, where they share useful tips and thousands of beautiful pictures. If you have questions, seasoned enthusiasts from all over the world would love to help you. Just take a look at the amazing artwork they posted.

Thanks to LiDAR, some high-end smartphones are now equipped with 3D cameras. LiDAR calculates distances by emitting infrared light to a target and measuring the time it takes for the reflection to bounce back. Cubiio 2 employs LiDAR technology to focus the laser beam on the target’s surface automatically and precisely.

Like every kind of light source, the laser has a limited lifetime and is a consumable product. Replacing the laser cartridge for Cubiio 2 is as simple as replacing the ink cartridge in a printer. We offer two types of laser cartridges, LC35 and LC50, with different wattages as shown below. Both types are interchangeable.

Cubiio 2 is a Class 1 laser product - naked-eye safe under all conditions of normal use. The complete enclosure prevents the laser from leaking. Lifting the lid stops the laser immediately. Cubiio 2 is equipped with an attenuator, digital lock, thermometer, accelerometer, beeper, emission indicator, and emergency stop switch. Your safety is our top priority.

Still here, still us, just 3 years older and with more experience. The Cubiio team closely cooperates with FPIC, a specialized company whose niche products are industrial laser cutters. These super machines can even cut sapphire. All Cubiio products are Made in Taiwan, where schools and businesses remain unaffected by COVID-19.

title: See Sense AGILE: The Compact, Reactive Bike Light
description: Elevate your safety with AGILE: the reactive bike light for exceptional visibility.
allParagraphs: Elevate your safety with AGILE: the reactive bike light for exceptional visibility.

AGILE is the new, compact addition to the See.Sense lighting range, designed to bring exceptional reactivity and brightness to your rides in our most compact, affordable package yet. Stay extra visible on the road with the patented reactivity that can only be found in See.Sense lights.
Pre-order now and save exclusively with Indiegogo pricing never to be seen again!

At See.Sense, we know how important it is to stay visible on the roads, and we know how much more can be done to keep cyclists seen. That's why AGILE uses our patented reactive technology to heighten your visibility precisely when it's needed most. It reacts to risky moments by flashing brighter and faster, ensuring you stay seen when you need it most, such as navigating traffic or tackling roundabouts.

We've been in the cycling business for more than a decade, creating innovative products using cyclist feedback. Over the years, we've run several successful crowdfunding campaigns, starting back in 2013 with our launch of the original See.Sense 2.0 bike light. In 2021, we introduced ICON3 on Indiegogo, the latest addition to the ICON series. Along the way, we've run successful campaigns on Kickstarter for products like BEAM, ICON, ICON2, and ACE lights. It's been a fantastic journey so far, with more than 100,000 cyclists using our products worldwide, and we're excited to keep providing gear that makes cycling better for everyone!

AGILE packs a serious punch for its size. With 120 lumens in the rear and 150 lumens in the front, AGILE is small but mighty. Plus, 260 degrees of visibility ensures you’ll stay noticed from all angles.
We were amongst the first companies in the world to produce daylight visible bike lights, and we continue with this with See.Sense AGILE. AGILE ensures you're seen 24/7, even in broad daylight.

Statistically around 80% of crashes happen in daylight hours, which is why we design our lights to shine brightly at any time you want to be out on your bike. Combined with its 260 degrees of visibility and reactive technology, AGILE ensures you stand out in all situations, at all times.

Brightness that fits in your pocket. Designed with versatility in mind, AGILE weighs under 30 grams (1.05 ounces) and comes equipped with our popular ‘twist and click’ mount. This mounting system makes it seamlessly compatible with our ICON3 light, meaning you can effortlessly swap between different lights or bikes.

AGILE doesn't just shine brightly; it also offers extended performance. With up to 16 hours of runtime in it's brightest reactive mode, AGILE’s intelligent energy management ensures you have power when you need it. Unlike other lights, AGILE provides a long runtime in it's most effective mode, not just in ECO mode!
AGILE also comes equipped with Auto On/Off - turning off after 3 minutes of inactivity to save battery life, and turning back on when you move your bike.
Choose between Reactive, ECO and Constant flash modes to suit your needs in every situation.

Customer service is one of our core company values, and with a team wide response desk, we are always at hand to help. Got a question about our Indiegogo campaign? Email team@seesense.cc and we will be more than happy to help.

We’re proud to be the Preferred Bike Light Supplier to British Cycling and the Official Bike Light and Ride Insights Supplier to Cycling Ireland, the National Governing Bodies for cycling in Britain and Ireland.  This recognition comes from our track record of delivering quality, innovative products designed for and by cyclists.

We plan to dispatch your AGILE bike lights in February 2024. Much of the production for AGILE has already been completed, including the casing, electronics, mounting system and tooling. This just leaves final road testing and firmware validation left to complete, so you won't have too long of a wait!

We ship all our orders either directly from Northern Ireland or if possible from warehouses in the USA. Northern Ireland remains a part of the European single market and the customs union. As such, there are no additional charges, fees, or duties on orders we send to the European Union or GB. For Rest of World, please note you are responsible for any custom/import charges imposed at your border.

AGILE, like all See.Sense lights, is built to last and comes with a free 12 month warranty. This is increased to a 24 month warranty when you register your light with See.Sense. The option to register your light will be provided to all AGILE backers upon delivery of the lights.

At See.Sense, sustainability is one of our core values. As such, we offer a ‘Service Maintenance’ for all See.Sense lights.  For a reasonable fee, we provide a complete overhaul of your light to bring it back to full factory standards (or upgrade it), minimising waste and ensuring you can go on to perform brilliantly. This service will continue for See.Sense AGILE.

At See.Sense, we're passionate about improving cyclist safety and visibility. Our vision is to make advanced safety accessible for every rider. We're a dedicated team of cycling enthusiasts with a mission to enhance the safety and visibility of cyclists worldwide. Learn more.

title: ZoomMaker: Affordable 2K SLA 3D Printer
description: High printing speed, high resolution, high performance
allParagraphs: High printing speed, high resolution, high performance

If 3D printing is such a disruptive technology that can bring impressive efficiency gains and localized micro-manufacturing capacity to anyone, then it shouldn’t be as expensive and complicated as it normally is. That’s why we decided to create Zoom Maker, the affordable and easy-to-use SLA 3D Printer that anyone can own and use.

We believe in democratizing access to 3D printing technology. That’s one of the foundations on which we developed Zoom Maker: it’s designed to be affordable. However, what about the quality? Well, we don’t believe in compromising the quality just to reduce the price. That’s why you’ll not only love Zoom Maker’s price—you’ll actually fall in love with its superb quality.

Zoom Maker does not only deliver a spectacular performance—it’s also very compact and extremely desktop-friendly. Measuring only 13.7 x 8.2 x 8.2 inches (35 x 21 x 21 cm) and weighing no more than 10 pounds (4.5Kg), Zoom Maker is the perfect 3D Printer for any small or large studio, office or workshop. Just place it on your desktop and see its magic happening!

You already know that Zoom Maker is compact… but make no mistake: its reduced dimensions only make it more convenient to keep, carry, use and store but don’t compromise its printing volume. In fact, Zoom Maker has a uniform maximum build area of 4.7 x 2.6 inches (120 x 68 mm) and a building height of 5.5 inches (140 mm). That means that while this is a small-sized 3D printer, it has the soul and capacity of a giant!

As a 3D printing device, Zoom Maker is as easy to understand as it’s easy to use. There are no complex requirements to operate it, so anyone can do it. Even better, Zoom Maker comes with easy-to-use software that supports a variety of desktop and cloud integrations, allowing you to seamlessly share and publish your creations. That’s how we’re making high-quality 3D printing more accessible than ever!

HD 3D Printing isn’t just a word we throw around. In the case of Zoom Maker, it’s a key feature. Printing at 45 micrometres XY resolution and up to 10 micrometre Z layer thickness, Zoom Maker prints in higher resolution to give you an outstanding outcome in terms of having the details of your design finely reproduced when printed.

That’s the perfect sequence—and you can engage in it with Zoom Maker. Equipped with a touch screen, you’re only a few touches away from operating this 3D printer in a truly seamless way and having it created high-quality objects.

Since it has an LCD display, Zoom Maker conveniently allows you to see the status of the 3D printing process at all times. It’s a perfect window into your 3D printing world, letting you know in detail how long each printing process should take and what’s the shape of the layer that the device is printing.

Zoom Maker has a USB port that allows you to insert a USB flash drive with your project, touch the screen to choose which project in the USB drive you want to print and get it going. So, if an internet connection isn’t available or if cloud-based drives aren’t making your life easier, you don’t need to worry about it. With Zoom Maker, all you need is a USB drive to start printing!

FDM 3D printers are fast and cheap. That’s true and it should be clearly stated. However, that’s not enough because the quality it delivers isn’t nearly as good as you’d want it to be. And that’s where an SLA 3D Printer such as Zoom Maker makes a difference: it’s super-fast, it’s super cheap, and it delivers extraordinary printing quality. That’s why Zoom Maker is the 3D printer you need!

We wanted to make 3D printing an easy-to-use technology, so that was one of our motivations to create Zoom Maker. However, we also wanted to create a 3D printer that offers more stability and reliability while requiring less intensive maintenance. Zoom Maker is a low-maintenance 3D printer that’s built to work and print consistently and smoothly over time.

Zoommaker has been producing high-quality 3D printers for years and has strong R&D capabilities. Now we enter the new stage of our product development, and we introduce the affordable 2K SLA 3D High-Performing Printer. We aim to create a 3D printer that is easy to use, affordable, and high quality. We believe 3D printers should be essentials for individuals and everybody can create the model as they like.

title: Clean One 2.0
description: •The Bass Tooth Brushing•Replaceable nano silicone brush head•Titanium alloy•Energy Saving & EP •EDC
allParagraphs: •The Bass Tooth Brushing•Replaceable nano silicone brush head•Titanium alloy•Energy Saving & EP •EDC
Experience teeth cleaning like never before!

The Bass Tooth Brushing (Scientific Vertical Brushing) is a method of brushing that effectively removes food debris and plaque from the gingival margins, gingival sulcus, and surface of the teeth, and is recommended by several national dental associations. By removing plaque and massaging the gums it helps to minimize disease-causing factors in the oral cavity, increase resistance to disease, prevent calculus, and prevent recession of the gums.

Titanium is recognized as a non-toxic element in the world, and has become the "King of Honorary Metals" due to its resistance to high and low temperatures, strong acids and alkalis, high strength, and anti-bacterial and biophilic properties.
Titanium itself does not emit harmful metal elements, so it is suitable for long-term use.
Innovative L-shaped rotating vertical brush design: Unleash the potential of your daily oral hygiene routine with our Clean One 2.0 breakthrough.

As we all know, horizontal brushing will grind the teeth into wedge-shaped defects, and it is not easy to remove the food debris in the crevices, which will easily cause chronic inflammation of the gums over time, resulting in bleeding and shrinkage of the gums, and even the pressure from the roots of the teeth will cause great damage to the gingival tissues.

Say goodbye to the ordinary and embrace the extraordinary! With its revolutionary L-shaped design, Clean One 2.0 is not just a toothbrush, it's a game changer. The entire body is made of titanium, keeping it lightweight and resistant to surface flaking and oxidization. The new titanium material design is more eco-friendly and durable.

Imagine: The Bass Tooth Brushing is a breeze with a toothbrush handle that rotates 180 degrees with ease. When you naturally master the scientifically proven vertical brushing technique, it cleans your gums and the inside of your teeth with ease, leaving you feeling energized. Get a cleaning experience unlike any other!

The curves of the Clean One 2.0 handle have been carefully designed to be more ergonomic and fit the grip better for a more elegant grip and more comfortable brushing. When you start a new day, every comfortable experience may bring you a good mood for the day!
Environmental protection and sustainability remain our mission. A toothbrush consisting of a titanium handle and recyclable brush head. Our goal is to reuse, reduce and recycle.

The replaceable toothbrush head design can save you 95% of the plastic of your toothbrush every year. It is our duty to protect the green home of the earth. It's not just a slogan, it's an action. Join us. You'll get a state-of-the-art sustainable toothbrush that helps protect the planet! Clean your teeth, look great, and the Clean One 2.0 will come with a lifetime warranty.

Toothbrushes are products we use every day and inevitably over 20 billion of them are thrown away every year! Most of them are made from cheap, disposable materials that have a short lifespan and are difficult to recycle! This is unacceptable.

Clean One 2.0 comes with a replaceable brush head and ultra-soft 0.15mm food-grade silicone bristles, pampering your gums and dental health with the softest yet most effective bristles while being anti-bacterial. Use silicone toothbrush head gums do not bleed, because the silicone toothbrush fiber is thicker, instead of piercing into the flesh of the gums and teeth, which does not easily lead to capillary dilation, gum sensitivity bleeding. In addition the cleaning power is superb! This is because the silicone adsorption is very strong, like using chewing gum, to adsorb tooth stains.
What does this mean for you? You can get a bright smile without creating plastic waste. Every brush helps create a cleaner environment.
Removal: Remove the brush head by rotating the brush handle to the center and pulling the handle ② out of the brush head ④.
Installation: Insert the handle ③ diagonally into the brush head hole ①, then press the handle ④ into the brush head hole ②.

Leaving your toothbrush lying around exposes it to all sorts of harmful bacteria, so we've also equipped it with a special toothbrush base that allows the Clean One 2.0 to stand securely without touching anything else, thus allowing the toothbrush to dry naturally. Together they protect your health.

It's more than just a toothbrush, it's a transformative experience. Let Clean One 2.0 be part of the oral hygiene revolution on Indiegogo! Your support is more than just a better smile; it's a commitment to a greener, healthier future. It's time to embrace a new era of innovation, sustainability and oral hygiene!

Wooden pods have grooves of different sizes. When the beans jump between the grooves, they produce a crisp, sweet sound that relaxes the brain.
In addition to being able to relax, it can also be attached to any iron surface, such as a refrigerator or a blackboard.

Made from wood from Africa and Zambia, it feels smooth and delicate. African Blackwood is one of the most popular and expensive woods in the world. Zambia Bloodwood also has precious qualities, such as waxy and pretty color, make it an ideal choice for musical instruments and fine furniture.
Its small size makes it ideal for carrying in your bag. Whether it's waiting in traffic jams or relaxing after studying, it can help you kill time and relax.

title: Timekettle WT2 Edge: 1st 2-Way Translation Earbuds
description: The most leading AI translation earbuds with smart noise reduction and bi-directional recognition
allParagraphs: The most leading AI translation earbuds with smart noise reduction and bi-directional recognition
Finally, natural real-time translations in 40 languages, in an earbud. Welcome to 2021.

Zoom calls. Global suppliers. We live in the era of fast and easy communication. And yet when it comes to translation, most of us are lagging well behind the times. We’re still fumbling with outdated phone apps and overpriced interpreters that leave you wondering, is this really 2021?

Introducing the WT2 Edge — the world’s first truly bi-directional simultaneous translation earbuds, translating in real-time as you speak and delivering it to your listener’s ear in as little as 0.5 seconds. With up to 95% accuracy in 40 languages and 93 accents, they’re the ultimate tool for breaking the language barrier — whether you’re closing deals on a video call or sparking a friendship at the hotel bar. No more awkward pauses or interpreters, just fast and accurate translations, so you can immerse yourself in the art of conversation. From pillow talk to boardroom banter. Welcome to 2021.

Until now, translating earbuds were a lot like old walkie-talkies. Only one person could speak at a time, while everyone else waited their turn to chime in. The translations worked. But the conversation was anything but natural.
Those days are over.

With the WT2 Edge, it’s always your turn to speak. The Edge are the first earbuds to offer true bi-directional simultaneous translation, meaning you can speak and hear other people’s translations at the same time – the way conversations were meant to be. No more awkward pauses to wait for your long-winded partner to finish. So your conversations flow naturally, from pillow-talk to boardroom banter.

The WT2 Edge earbuds know your voice is unique. That’s why it uses dual beamforming microphones and directional voice recognition to focus on the sound of your voice, separating it from other voices nearby.  So you’ll never mince words with whoever’s sitting next to you.

And to make translations even more accurate, the Edge earbuds use smart noise-reduction to filter out distracting background noises. Making sure your message isn’t muddied by motorcycle traffic and tapping pens. So when you do take the floor to speak your mind, your message comes across loud and clear.

Every top translation engine has its perks. That’s why we used... all of them. Powered by the world’s 6 leading translation engines (DeepL, Google, Microsoft, iFlytek, AmiVoive, Hoya) and Timekettle its own, the Edge earbuds deliver faster and more accurate translations to your meetings and conversations. They take the advantage of all 6 engines and combines them to deliver a well-rounded translation experience that’s truly world-class. Delivering up to 95 percent accuracy in some languages. So when you’re plugging in at your next industry conference or talking sports with the limo driver, you’ll know your words are getting a world-class treatment.

Opportunity rarely knocks twice. That’s why the WT2 Edge uses 15 servers worldwide to deliver you the fastest translations possible, no matter where you are. How fast, you ask? The Edge can deliver simultaneous, bi-directional translations in as little as 0.5 to 3 seconds. Bringing you professional-level translations to help your board meetings and client sit-downs go smoothly.

Making connections just got a whole lot easier. Simul Mode helps you connect one on one for effortless face-to-face communication. Just share one of your WT2 Edge earbuds with your partner, and both of your words will be translated in real-time for natural, bi-directional communication without an interpreter. The way conversations were meant to be.

The mic is always yours. With Touch Mode, you don’t need to talk over each other in a multi-person meeting. Simply tap your earbud when you have something to say and you’re in control of the conversation. Other mics are muted when it’s your turn to speak, and your message will be translated and delivered to everyone listening. When you’re finished speaking and ready to listen, just tap the earbud again to let someone else have their say. It’s the perfect moderator to your cross-cultural conferences.

We know you can’t always ask strangers to put an Edge earbud in while you talk to them – like that taxi driver or bartender who speaks zero English. That’s why we made Speaker Mode. While you’re wearing an earbud, simply say what you need to say. The Edge will then translate and deliver your message through your phone’s speaker, so anyone in earshot can hear it.

Or if you prefer to keep the volume down, the Edge app also displays your translation in both languages on the phone screen. It even powers Text-to-Speech to read your typed messages out loud. Now you can go about your day without getting lost in translation.

Just because you didn’t study Mandarin in high school doesn’t mean you can’t handle the next business trip to Beijing. The WT2 Edge earbuds support 40 languages and 93 dialects. So no matter where you go, you can put your best foot forward knowing there’s no situation or conversation you can’t handle. From the moment you step off the plane, to the moment you stride into your dinner reservation.

The best adventures often happen off the beaten path. That can also mean far from a good internet connection. That’s why we equipped the Edge with seven languages and counting available for offline access. So whether you’re sipping tea with your suppliers in South China or exploring a winery with your partners in Tuscany, the WT2 Edge is there to help get your order right.

Travel bans. Quarantines. 2020 brought plenty of unexpected barriers to business. But language doesn’t have to be one of them. The Edge’s Group Chat supports up to thirty people speaking thirty different languages at once, making it ideal for Zoom calls and remote meetings, even when your business spans the globe.

Group Chat even supports both voice-to-text and text-to-text recording through Edge’s app. So you can leave the meeting minutes to us. They’ll be automatically saved to the cloud in your desired language, ready for you to download, copy, and share to your heart’s content.

You’ll be the talk of the town with the WT2 Edge’s sleek design. And whether that town is Taiwan or Timbuktu, you’ll understand every word they say in real-time. The Edge earbuds are 46% lighter than our last-gen translating earbuds and 33% smaller. Plus they weigh in at a sleek 5.4 grams each, so you won’t even notice them in your ear while you’re in and out of meetings all day or out exploring the city.

We’ve tailored the Edge earbuds to fit your ear comfortably while sealing in audio for superior noise reduction. The WT2 Edge is designed to sit snug in your ears for hours on end. So jump on that moped and enjoy the ride knowing your earbuds will stay right where they belong.

Whether you’re closing a business deal or ending a dinner date, the last thing you want to hear is a low battery warning. That’s why the WT2 Edge gives you three hours of nonstop translating time on a single charge. And a full 12 hours with the portable charging case. Meaning you’ll often have enough battery to power a full week of work or a short trip abroad on a single charge. So whether you’re closing a deal in Calcutta or making friends in Frankfurt, you’ll never be cut off mid-sentence.

Three years ago, we brought you the first generation of translating earbuds — the WT2. For the first time in history, you could skip the interpreter and have a face-to-face conversation with someone in a completely different language, all with just a simple pair of earbuds.
Then came the WT2 Plus — the best-selling translation earbuds on Amazon.com to this day with over 300,000 happy customers.

But much like the business world, we never stop looking forward. Now, we’re bringing you the WT2 Edge, the world’s first bi-directional, simultaneous translation earbuds, delivering real-time two-way translations for natural conversation in up to 40 different languages. We’re in the business of breaking down language barriers. We hope you are, too.

Finally, a translation tool that can keep up with the pace of business. It’s 2021 — time to demand more from your translations. No more pens to hold, no more awkward typing on your phone. Just a hands-free experience that delivers real-time natural translations within seconds.

The Timekettle WT2 Edge are the first earbuds to offer truly bi-directional simultaneous translation, allowing for natural two-way communication without awkward pauses. Our smart noise-reduction technology means you hear more of what matters, while directional voice recognition helps the Edge earbuds to home in on the sound of your voice for clearer translations. Not to mention they support more languages and accents than any other translating earbuds on the market. And with accuracy reaching as high as 95% with translation speeds as fast as 0.5 seconds from our 15 worldwide servers.

title: Germanicum Arminius Damascus knives
description: The most sharp and durable Damascus knife series we have ever made.
allParagraphs: The most sharp and durable Damascus knife series we have ever made.
... our most sharp and durable Damascus knife series we have ever made.
Germanicum Arminius is the result of hundreds of hours in refinement of Damascus forging techniques, refinement of production technologies and design improvements on every level.
Our team of dedicated engineers, black smiths and designers put all their passion into this new series of Damascus knives and today we are proud to share these beautiful new knives with you.
Sternsteiger started its own production of Damascus knives back in 2015 and the companies passion for tradition and technology since then has driven the company to new innovations.

Our engineers did not limit themselves to Damascus knives and brought beautiful knives like the popular Sternsteiger Titanium and Achilles Series to market. These endeavors not only helped us to understand the needs of our customers, but also provided us with the experience to improve on our original classic Damascus knife design.

In case you are interested to learn more about the development process of Germanicum Arminius scroll down to the development section, but let us focus for now on what we have improved based upon our original VG10 series below.

We completely re-engineered the finger-guard and bolster tip section of the knife in order to shorten the distance between handle and blade. This much more compact design results into a higher degree of control over the blade.
For more pressure point and grip, a new added Bolster has been added below.
The new bolster is made of the same Damascus steel and is held in place with two brass pins that are polished in a way that they optically merge with the steel.
The new blade is overall more straight than the old design. On the picture below you can see how the old blade falls off towards the edge, while our new blade offers an almost straight surface.

The tapered shape of the old blade makes the knife very stable, but also inflexible. The new flatter shape gives the blade more flexibility and thanks to the new steel we don't lose anything in terms of durability.
In addition the new blade has been straightened with a slightly more curved belly while adding some width in the middle of the blade, providing a greater surface area for improved cuts.

The biggest difference between the two series is the steel which now consists of 440 instead of 67 layers of steel. This increased amount of steel layers gives the blade much more rigidity and therefore increases the durability and lifetime of the blade.

In addition the blade itself becomes a piece of art. Our black smiths have become very creative in regards to possible patterns that can be forged into the blade and therefore making each blade a unique master piece.
The prominient but important feature is this handle, its made up of pure wallnut wood, as compared to our VG-10 series, which has an Micarta handle.
The handle is finished by a pure Damascus cap which compared to the basic stainless steel cap from the VG-10 series gives these knives an even better look and durability.
The old VG-10 series had an Oval shaped bigger Cap, where as the new Arminius series has an Egg shaped oval Damascus forged cap with a pin.
The handle diameter has been trimmed making the Arminius handle thinner -tubular and easier to hold even for smaller hands.
The same applies to the new handle cap as explained above.
The Arminius series has different blade serrations for cutting bread.
Even the Tip of the Arminius bread knife has been changed below ( continous form) below.
The handle features the same updated characteristics like the brass pins and the red leather ring inlays with an added U sahped or V shaped forged Bolster below.
The exciting striking feature of the new Arminius Series is its completely hand-made forging production as compared to the mechnical industrial production of our old VG-10 series.

Since the carbon content is more in the Arminius series, its non stainless steel and have an increased tendency to oxidation process, which is a standard normal behaviour of all original historical hand forged damascus forge.

Arminius Series is an inspired historical handmade forging process as compared to our old VG-10 series which is actually done via closed die forging or impression die forging. Our bladesmiths have used same old age forging methods to have this unique series for you.
Damascus Steel & great warriors in history.

It is been said that the great ancient warriors loved the damascus weaponary originated from the city of Damascus ( modern day Syria ). In those days, the damascus forgeing steel was forged with bringing the steel into a wootz form.

Our team has been trying to forge a knife that has the unique combination of finest elements of steel & wood. For this reason, we included the 440 layers of damascus & the wallnut wooden handles for Arminius damascus Series.
This unique damascus knife series will be presented in two damascus design patterns
A- Raindrop damascus Pattern
B - Twist damascus  Pattern
Note:     ( patterns can slightly varry due to hand forge)

We have deliverd successfully intime, to more than 4000 backers during our past amazing campaigns here in Kickstarter and  below are some of the Feedbacks for you to experiance, what they say about STERNSTEIGER products.
The unique design inspired by the great fighter Arminius gives it an elegant look.
Though Arminius Damascus Knife stands out of most Sternsteiger products, some special features of this masterpiece are as follows

High-end Blade: The Damascus steel blade is certainly the best part about Arminius Damascus Knife. The unique design inspired by the great fighter Arminius gives it an elegant look. If you’re concerned about quality, worry no more because it’s going to cut through any to everything.

Handle: The handle of Arminius Damascus Knife is made up of walnut wood and works for a lifetime. Yes, if you’ll take good care of the blade, the handle isn’t going to fade, broke, or lose its stylish look even after 10 years. In addition, it offers a firm grip to handle hard or raw vegatables.
Handle Cap:

The perfect harmony of joining the specially forged damascus cap adds up the stunning look to this amazing master piece series.The handle cap is made up of damascus steel which adds up an extra flare to this series.
The forged Bolster:

one of the added uniqueness to Arminius series, is its special forged blade bolster, which is a wedge shaped forged but gives the blade an added  ` U ` shaped support forge with colourfull red leather filled spacing to look after the joining effect to its amazing handle.This special forge bolster was developed for giving an additional cutting balance retention to this amazing knife series. ( see below the ` U `` shaped bolster with pins )
So, now we see the hype behind popular Damascus steel knives. If we talk about this particular knife set, it is guaranteed to provide the best hunting or cooking experience ever.
Arminius Damascus Knife is made with the highest quality of steels and a prolonged  manufacturing procedure of blacksmith.
360 ° revolvation of Arminius Blade to show more details.  ( see above )
The basic idea & design:
Prototype Section: CAD Designs
Combined with tradational classic design & focus onto better cuttings, our team tried to achieve a tool collection covering daily home use aswell the commercial use.
Arminius bread knife has been inspired by the japanese saw inorder to break the tradational bread knife blade serations.
The paring knife:

The master pieces joining together in the modern wooden stand to form a complete Set.
